T04sanssr_pu:4: yasyāśraveṇa narakādi mahāprapātadāhādiduṣkham anubhūtam abhūd bhavadbhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5: tīvraṃ punaḥ punar annantam aśāntacittais tac chrotum ādaram udārataraṃ bhajadhvam //
T04sanssr_pu:6: śrutvā ... pāpaṃ annuddhatātmā pūrvārjitaṃ ca vipulaṃ kṣapayaty aśeṣam /
T04sanssr_pu:7: aprāptapūrvam api saukhyam avāpnuvanti hāniṃ sukhāc ca na kadācid api prayānti //
T04sanssr_pu:8: sambodhisatvasukham uttamam akṣaya ... apy asamasaṃpadam āpnuvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:9: tad dharmaratnam atidurlabham apy alabdhaṃ labdhakṣaṇāḥ śṛṇvata sādaram ucyamānam //
T04sanssr_pu:10: āyāntu ca tribhuvanaikahitasya vākyaṃ śrotuṃ prasannamanasaḥ suranāgasatvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:12: sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyādarato 'khilāṃś ca vandyān /
T04sanssr_pu:14: na ca kiñcid apūrvam atra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgranthanakauśalaṃ mamāsti /
T04sanssr_pu:15: ata eva na me parārthayatnaḥ svamano bhāvayituṃ mamedam iṣṭam //
T04sanssr_pu:16: mama tāvad anena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:17: yadi matsamadhātur eva paśyed aparo 'py enam ato 'pi sārthako 'yam //
T04sanssr_pu:19: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punar apy eṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:22: durlabhāṣṭākṣaṇanirvṛttir durlabho manuṣyapratilambho durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpadviśuddhir durlabho buddhotpādo /
T04sanssr_pu:29: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyalokae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:30: tad evaṃvidhaṃ samāgamam āsādya saṃvṛtiparamārthataḥ suviditasaṃsāraduṣkhasyopaśamanasukhābhilāṣiṇo buddhagotrānubhāvāt tu yasya mahāsatvasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣotpadyate //
T04sanssr_pu:31: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca na priyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:32: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yat taṃ rakṣāmi netaram /
T04sanssr_pu:35: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matir dṛḍhā //
T04sanssr_pu:37: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām /
T04sanssr_pu:38: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati cittaṃ mahāpuruṣāṇām //
T04sanssr_pu:43: śraddha nidhānadhanaṃ caraṇāgraṃ pāṇi yathā śubhasaṃgrahamūlam //
T04sanssr_pu:60: te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti /
T04sanssr_pu:61: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī /
T04sanssr_pu:69: ye avivarttika saṃghaprasannās te avivarttika śraddhabalātaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:80: ye sadādhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣūpapadyati bodhayi cittam /
T04sanssr_pu:81: yeṣūpapadyati bodhayi cittaṃ te abhiyukta maharṣiguṇeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:83: jātaya buddhakule anujātās te samayoga ayogavimuktāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:86: āśayu yeṣa prasādaviśuddhaḥ teṣa adhyāśayu uttamaśreṣṭhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:87: yeṣa adhyāśayu uttamaśreṣṭhas te sada pāramitāsu caranti //
T04sanssr_pu:88: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipanna iho mahayāne /
T04sanssr_pu:89: ye pratipanna iho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān //
T04sanssr_pu:90: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddha abhedyā /
T04sanssr_pu:94: teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:95: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:96: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sada dhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhir /
T04sanssr_pu:101: ye tu śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyās te imi śraddadhi hetubalena //
T04sanssr_pu:103: nota tu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato imi dharmmān //
T04sanssr_pu:105: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:107: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati /
T04sanssr_pu:110: śraddhāyām ānanda yogaḥ karaṇīya idaṃ tathāgato vijñapayatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:114: tad evaṃ / śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt tad yathāryasiṃhaparipṛcchāyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:118: priyaś ca bhoti satvānāṃ yatra yatropapadyate //
T04sanssr_pu:121: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:139: iti hi kulaputra bodhicittam ebhiś cānyaiś cāpramāṇair guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgatam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:147: ratnakaraṇḍasūtrāc ca pṛthagjano 'pi bodhisatva iti jñāyate //
T04sanssr_pu:148: yathoktaṃ / tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ aṇḍakoṣaprakṣipto 'pi kalaviṅkapoto /
T04sanssr_pu:149: asaṃbhinnāṇḍa aniśkrāntaḥ koṣāt kalaviṅkarutam eva muñcati //
T04sanssr_pu:151: asaṃbhinnātmadṛṣṭir aniṣkrāntas traidhātukād buddharutam eva muñcati /
T04sanssr_pu:154: jayamateś ca bodhisatvasya pṛthivī vidāram adāt /
T04sanssr_pu:156: sa hi śūnyatāṃ nādhimuktavān śūnyatāvādini ca pratighaṃ kṛtavān //
T04sanssr_pu:160: kaścit puruṣaḥ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn abhikramitukāmaḥ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:161: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇādhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet /
T04sanssr_pu:162: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu punar aśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi pratyākṛṣya pratyudāvartyeti /
T04sanssr_pu:163: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenātikramitum /
T04sanssr_pu:164: yāvad annabhilāpyānabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum atikramitum /
T04sanssr_pu:168: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:173: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svādhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati /
T04sanssr_pu:174: sa tena dhanvaprajño bhavati so 'nnuttarajñānamārgāt pratyākṛṣyate pratyudāvarttyate /
T04sanssr_pu:175: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanātaḥ prajñendriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate /
T04sanssr_pu:177: tad evam eṣā śūnyatānadhimuktir mahāyānānabhiratiś cāsaṃpūrṇādhimukticittacaryasyāpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:185: kasmād anye bodhicittotpādakā asyāṃ bhūmau neṣyante /
T04sanssr_pu:186: na cātrecchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītārthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:207: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti tyāga iti /
T04sanssr_pu:208: evam ihānyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā notpadyatae eva //
T04sanssr_pu:210: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann annutpāditabodhicittaḥ tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa
T04sanssr_pu:211: vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau bodhicittam
T04sanssr_pu:213: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:214: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya yāvad annuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya
T04sanssr_pu:215: sa tathāgatasya sarvākāraparipūrṇatāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādya annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:216: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca bodhiprasthāna cittaṃ ca /
T04sanssr_pu:218: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nnuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
T04sanssr_pu:219: tato 'pi durlabhatamās te satvā ye 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃprasthitā iti /
T04sanssr_pu:221: mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:224: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanssr_pu:226: ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena /
T04sanssr_pu:227: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ daśikāṃ dattvā tantravāyabhūtena /
T04sanssr_pu:228: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrārciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ dattvā nagarāvalambakabhūtena /
T04sanssr_pu:229: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenety ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:233: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:236: evam eva kulaputrāśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti /
T04sanssr_pu:238: itaś ca vināpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:240: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:241: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:243: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ... praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgrad api bhuñjāno 'pi /
T04sanssr_pu:248: sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvānumodasvāgrayā anumodanayā yāvad
T04sanssr_pu:252: tataḥ sarvasatvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñātapratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine
T04sanssr_pu:253: dine traikālyam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja
T04sanssr_pu:254: pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi bodhisaṃbhārāṃś
T04sanssr_pu:257: sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo vipākenānnekaśatakṛtvo deveṣūpapanno 'bhūḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:259: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyopapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi /
T04sanssr_pu:260: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya kuśalakarmaṇa ūnatvaṃ vāpūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:261: api ca mahārāja ekam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvottāraṇārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvāmocanārambaṇatvāt
T04sanssr_pu:263: kaḥ punar vādo ya evaṃ bahulīkarotīti //
T04sanssr_pu:267: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kim abhūmipraviṣṭhasyāpi bodhisatvasamvarādhikāro 'sti na veti /
T04sanssr_pu:270: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra mayaivaiṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ sarvopakaraṇabāhulyam upanāmayitavyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:272: pramuditāyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau suvyavasthito bhavaty acalanayoge ... ti /
T04sanssr_pu:276: śrāvakayānam evāsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:283: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyāpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:284: yatra vāsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyopadeśas tatrābhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vādikarmikabodhisatvena na śikṣitavyaṃ bhaved etat /
T04sanssr_pu:289: na cātra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:291: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:293: caturbhiḥ śāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ bodhisatvāḥ satyavādino bhavantīty ārabhyāha /
T04sanssr_pu:294: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyārabdhavīryo viharati kuśaladharmaparyeṣaṇāyety ārabhya sarva upadeśaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:296: evaṃ hy asya śikṣātikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ cotpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:297: tatra cānnābhogataḥ premagauravasiddhir ity eṣa sāmānyasaṃvaradharmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:298: ata eva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:299: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyābhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvābhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram ātmabalaṃ ca tulayitvā /
T04sanssr_pu:300: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:301: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvāpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ cādadato narakagatiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:302: kiṃ punar annuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyāsaṃpādayataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:306: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na parityajati na satveṣu vipratipadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:308: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvāda iti /
T04sanssr_pu:310: syād yathāpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenopanimantryopekṣako bhaven nānnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet /
T04sanssr_pu:312: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyātīrṇatāraṇāyāmuktamocanāyānnāśvastāśvāsanāya
T04sanssr_pu:313: yāvan na bāhuśrutye 'bhiyogaṃ karoti nāpi tato 'nyeṣu bodhipakṣyakuśalamūleṣu dharmeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:315: evaṃ ca taṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā uccagghanti vivādayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:316: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyottārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:317: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ visaṃvādayet //
T04sanssr_pu:318: punar aparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ kenacid evādhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣv arthakaraṇīyeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:319: tatra bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitā bhavati yāvad ātmaparityāgo 'pi bodhisatvena kartavyo bhavet tatra na punaḥ sa satvo visaṃvādayitavya iti /
T04sanssr_pu:320: tasmāt svabalānurūpeṇaikam api kuśalamūlaṃ samādāya rakṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:323: na punar yo 'ntaśa ekam api yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na rakṣati atha ca punar evaṃ vadati /
T04sanssr_pu:325: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako lokasyocchedavādī sa mūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kurute vinipātagāmī bhavatīti /
T04sanssr_pu:326: yāvat kālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvat kālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya vartitavyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:328: yas tu mahāsatva evaṃ śrutvāpi bodhisatvacaryāduṣkaratām api prajñayāvagāhyotsahatae
T04sanssr_pu:330: kṛtvā kalyāṇamitram abhyetya taduktānuvādena svayaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:332: yathāryamañjuśrībuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṅkārasūtre bhagavatā mañjuśriyā pūrvajanmāvadāne caryopetaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tathotpādayitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:337: nimantraye jagat sarvaṃ dāridryān mocitāsmi tat //
T04sanssr_pu:339: adyāgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā /
T04sanssr_pu:345: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:347: śodhayiṣye manaḥkarma karma karttāsmi nāśubham / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:348: na cātra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmāntarāpattiśaṅkā kartavyātraiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānānujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:349: yathā tenākṣobhyeṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisatvabhūtenaivaṃ vāg bhāṣitā /
T04sanssr_pu:350: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na pravrajeyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:352: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ saiva saṃśodhayiṣyatīty ukteḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:353: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya anuśikṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:354: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām annutpādād vāvaśyaṃ gṛhāvāsān niṣkrāmati
T04sanssr_pu:356: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhāvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:359: yathā janmāntareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathātraiva vakṣyamāṇam ity āstāṃ tāvad etat //
T04sanssr_pu:360: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate /
T04sanssr_pu:361: yenāpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya pariharen na cāpattipratirūpakeṣv annāpattipratirūpakeṣu ca saṃmuhyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:362: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ varttamānānāgatasarvaduṣkhadaurmanasyopaśamāya varttamānānāgatasukhasaumanasyotpādāya ca niḥśāṭhyataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥparākramaiḥ prayatnaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:363: yadi tu tatpratyayasāmagrīṃ nānveṣate tadannantarāya pratikārāya na ghaṭate alpaduṣkhadaurmanasyaṃ bahuduṣkhadaurmanasyapratikārabhūtaṃ notpādayati
T04sanssr_pu:364: mahārthasiddhyarthaṃ cālpārthahāniṃ na karoti kṣaṇam apy upekṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:366: saṃkṣepato 'nnāpattiḥ svaśaktyaviśayeṣu kāryeṣu tatra niṣphalatayā śikṣyāprajñaptyabhāvāt /
T04sanssr_pu:368: yatra svaśaktyagocare 'pi tyāgasāmarthyād āpattiḥ syāt tan na cintyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:369: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:375: nirūpya yathārham atikrāmaty antaśaś caṇḍāladāsenāpi coditaḥ sāpattiko bhavati / kutaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:377: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:383: yasya kasyacin maitreya ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā /
T04sanssr_pu:384: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā buddhasaṃjñotpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanssr_pu:387: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:388: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti /
T04sanssr_pu:389: teṣu cāgauravam utpādayet pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:391: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsārthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati /
T04sanssr_pu:392: tenātra śikṣāsamuccaye tāvac caryāmukhamātraśikṣaṇārtham abhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ śikṣārambhasyaiva mahāphalatvāt /
T04sanssr_pu:394: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo
T04sanssr_pu:396: evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād /
T04sanssr_pu:397: yo vānyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatva imān evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā ekāntena gatvā cittenābhinirūpayed imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:398: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T04sanssr_pu:399: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti /
T04sanssr_pu:400: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:402: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ satvas teṣām ekaikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpādhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:403: yo mahāyānam udgrahiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravarttayiṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:404: tasya nakhachedena māsaṃ pañcapalikena divasenāvatārayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ caitenāpakrameṇa
T04sanssr_pu:406: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatva evam ucyamāno no trasyati na saṃtrāsam āpsyate 'ntaśa ekacittotpādenāpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na vicikitsate /
T04sanssr_pu:407: uttari ca saddharmmaparigrahārtham abhiyujyate pāṭhasvādhyāyābhimukto viharati /
T04sanssr_pu:408: ayaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaś cittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:409: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:410: sa mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo brahmasama indrasamo 'kampya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:424: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:426: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:427: kiṃ tarhi yānīmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā /
T04sanssr_pu:428: bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni teṣu teṣu mayā śikṣitavyam iti vistaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:429: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistaroktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:432: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrānteṣu mahāyānābhiratānām arthāyoktāni /
T04sanssr_pu:439: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena duṣkham upagāmī /
T04sanssr_pu:440: saced bodhisatvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyāvasthitasyāpi kalpakoṭer atyayenaikaṃ sukhacittam utpadyetāntaśo niṣadya cittam api /
T04sanssr_pu:441: tatra bodhisatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasatvānām ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyaitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:444: pañcemāni devaputrānantaryāṇi yair ānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ kṣipram annuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:446: yadā devaputra bodhisatvo 'dhyāśayaty annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nāntarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ devaputra prathamam ānantaryaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:447: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatīdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam ānantaryam /
T04sanssr_pu:448: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyā ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā sīdatīdaṃ devaputra tṛtīyam ānantaryam /
T04sanssr_pu:449: annutpannāniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatatīdaṃ devaputra caturtham ānantaryam /
T04sanssr_pu:450: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:451: tasmād evam ātmabhāvabhogapuṇyānām aviratam utsargarakṣāśuddhivṛddhayo yathāyogaṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:452: tatra tāvad utsargārthaṃ parigrahadoṣabhāvanādvāreṇa vairāgyam utpādayet tyāgānuśaṃsāṃś ca bhāvayet /
T04sanssr_pu:454: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag /
T04sanssr_pu:457: te yānti narakān ghorān mṛtyuyānagatābudhā / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:459: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra nidānamūlam /
T04sanssr_pu:463: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñām utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:468: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:472: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:473: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
T04sanssr_pu:478: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:489: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpadyate tathānyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:491: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na viṣamacittasya bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya /
T04sanssr_pu:493: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣyānyatre 'mitrasaṃjñotpādayitavyāmitraṃ hy etan mama /
T04sanssr_pu:495: yo 'ham asyārthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyā uddhuratād gatvāsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpādayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:497: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathāsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremānugatā maitry utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:504: neha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
T04sanssr_pu:506: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:509: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanaka upasaṃkramya kiñcid eva vastu yāceta /
T04sanssr_pu:512: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam avaśyaṃ mamaitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:514: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ cainaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:515: etac ca vastu parityajyāhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
T04sanssr_pu:516: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:517: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
T04sanssr_pu:518: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:526: mā paritāpsīs tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
T04sanssr_pu:528: yathainaṃ ca tavābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasatvānāṃ ceti /
T04sanssr_pu:532: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatra aprasādo bodhisatve vā yācanakasyeti /
T04sanssr_pu:533: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ annavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:535: catvāra ime śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
T04sanssr_pu:542: yasyeme śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa paṇḍita.ir jñātavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:546: saṃkleśadharmo vatāyaṃ lokāmiṣaguruko vatāyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatāyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:547: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:564: na tad vastūpādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:566: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe notsarjanacittam utpādayen na sa parivāra upādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:567: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastūpādātavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:569: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:571: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:572: tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastārthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādārthikebhyo
T04sanssr_pu:574: māṃsaṃ māṃsārthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitārthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjārthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgārthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi
T04sanssr_pu:575: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnābharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu
T04sanssr_pu:576: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:578: annapekṣo dāsyāmi satvānugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvānukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya /
T04sanssr_pu:579: yathā me 'mī satvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syur iti / peyālaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:580: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:581: tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naivaṃ bhavati vikalpo /
T04sanssr_pu:582: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:583: api tu khalu punar avikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
T04sanssr_pu:584: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenāsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā
T04sanssr_pu:585: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenārthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastārthinaḥ pādaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:588: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:589: tad yathāpi nāmemāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur
T04sanssr_pu:590: vāyudhātuś ca nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:592: evam evāham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:593: sa imam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvāvekṣayeti //
T04sanssr_pu:595: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:596: kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāharan pradīpasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣūpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:598: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
T04sanssr_pu:600: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nnuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu
T04sanssr_pu:601: saṃdarśayamānaḥ annuttarasukhopadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ sūryasamam
T04sanssr_pu:604: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
T04sanssr_pu:608: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:612: pratipattau cātmānaṃ sthāpayamāno bodhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇa udyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
T04sanssr_pu:613: dharmaratibhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvalokeṣv ādarśayamānaḥ saumanasyadātāram ātmānaṃ sarvasatvānām adhitiṣṭhan /
T04sanssr_pu:614: annantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:618: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto
T04sanssr_pu:624: sārādānābhiprāya iti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
T04sanssr_pu:625: maitryopacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:626: ariṣṭacitto bhūtvākṣatacitto 'nnupahatacitto mahātman salā ... citto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto
T04sanssr_pu:628: jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā ... yācanakasya sarvaśarīram
T04sanssr_pu:629: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryopacārāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:630: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
T04sanssr_pu:631: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi prītamānasa ātmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta
T04sanssr_pu:632: iti sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmāgraśiraḥ paramajñānam avataran sarvasatvaparitrāṇaśirobodhi
T04sanssr_pu:633: ... gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ annupamajñānam abhilaṣan sarvadikchiraḥ prāptuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:635: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenānugrahacāritreṇa
T04sanssr_pu:640: iti hi bodhisatvaḥ svaśarīram ākṣipya rudhiram anuprayacchan yācanakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto /
T04sanssr_pu:643: prītiprasrabdhyā svaśarīrānapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrād rudhiram anuprayacchan jñānāyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā
T04sanssr_pu:644: mahāyānāvinaṣṭamanā iṣṭamanās tuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanāḥ muditamanā maitrymanāḥ sukhamanāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:645: prasannamanāḥ pramuditaprītisaumanasyajāto majjāmāṃsaṃ svaśarīrāt parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ kalyāṇatyāgayā /
T04sanssr_pu:647: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā kāmakaruṇāyā tulyaprītivivarddhanena tyāgacittena /
T04sanssr_pu:655: bodhisatvaḥ svahṛdayaṃ parityajan yācanakebhyo dānavaśaśikṣitacittaḥ pāramitāniṣpādanacittaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:660: sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛdbukkāphupphuṣaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:661: yācakebhyaḥ parityajan yācanakābhiprasannayā dṛṣṭyā prasannaprītyākārair netrair
T04sanssr_pu:665: śarīrānityatayāpaviddhaśarīreṇa parabhaktacetanena evaṃ dharmamanasikāraprayukto bodhisatvas tān yācanakān animiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇa evaṃ cittam utpādayati
T04sanssr_pu:666: yadi cāham etadyācanakasya etaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛdbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:669: sa evaṃ manasikārasaṃtoṣitena santānenaivaṃ dharmajñānenāśayena kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena
T04sanssr_pu:670: yācanakadarśanenāsārāt kāyāt sāram ādātukāmo dharmakāmatayā svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann
T04sanssr_pu:673: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyānyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:678: mayaiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyā abhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:679: evaṃ samṛddhapraṇipātena kṣamayati sarvayācanakān kṣamayitvā snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayopakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:680: yad idaṃ maṇirathān jambudvīpakalyāṇakanyāratnaparipūrṇān yad idaṃ suvarṇarathān janapadaviśuddhakanyāratnaparipūrṇān /
T04sanssr_pu:683: tathātraiva deśitaṃ maṇirathān vā dadānaḥ sarvaratnajālasaṃchannān ājāneyahastyupetān /
T04sanssr_pu:685: candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān ratnasiṃhāsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvan nānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān
T04sanssr_pu:692: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā sarvabuddhānām upādadāno rājyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:693: vā parityajan paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathārhaṃ vā
T04sanssr_pu:694: yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vāpasṛjan /
T04sanssr_pu:696: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān
T04sanssr_pu:697: avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān kaṭakān kaṣāyān nānārasāgropetān susnigdhān vividharasavidhinopetān
T04sanssr_pu:700: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:704: buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyādhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā dadānaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:708: guruśuśrūṣopasthānacittatayā ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyebhyo vā dadānas tatra tatra gurusaṃbhārāvavādaśikṣaṇaprayuktaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:711: iti hi bodhisatvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitān /
T04sanssr_pu:712: ṣaṣṭihāyanān ṣaḍgantropetān padmavarṇān mukhaviśuddhān suvarṇālaṃkārān hemajālapraticchannaśarīrān
T04sanssr_pu:716: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitramātāpitṛbhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyaḥ sarvajagatpratigrāhakabhyo muktacittayā dadāno /
T04sanssr_pu:718: pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvādhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi bodhisatva
T04sanssr_pu:719: āsanadānaṃ dadānaḥ parityajan rājabhadrāsanāni vaiḍūryapādakāni siṃhapratiṣṭhitāni
T04sanssr_pu:725: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan mahāratnavyūhapratimaṇḍitāni ratnadaṇḍāni kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannāni /
T04sanssr_pu:730: annapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo
T04sanssr_pu:733: vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne vā sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:735: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣūpadiṣṭaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:737: katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām etaiḥ kuśalamūlair narakāpāyapratiprasrabdhir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:739: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
T04sanssr_pu:740: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
T04sanssr_pu:755: maitracittaḥ premacittaḥ anugrahacitto hitacittaḥ sukhacittaḥ pariṇāmayati /
T04sanssr_pu:757: idaṃ mama kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ gativiśuddhaye saṃvarteta /
T04sanssr_pu:767: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān ārāgayeyur ārāgayitvā ca mā virāgayeyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:768: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
T04sanssr_pu:769: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:776: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca dāridryaṃ vinivarttayeyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:777: sapta dhanapratilambhāṃś ca paripūrayeyuḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ cānuśikṣayeyuḥ kalyāṇendriyapratilambhaṃ cādhigaccheyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:785: yena ca sukhopadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhopadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti //
T04sanssr_pu:792: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasāgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ avipannayānā agrayānā uttamayānāḥ śīghrayānā mahāyānāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:807: sarvasatvā bodhisatvapariṇāmanāvāsitā bhavantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvaśukladharmavāsitā bhavantu sarvākuśaladharmaprahīṇāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:815: sarvasatvā annantālokā bhavantu sarvabuddhadharmeṣu sarvasatvā apratihatāvabhāsā bhavantu sarvadharmadhātvekaspharaṇāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:825: sarvasatvā apramāṇabhājanā bhavantv ākāśadhātuvipulāḥ smṛtīndriyopetāḥ sarvalaukikalokottarabhāṣasaṃgrahaṇād grahaṇasmṛtyasaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:835: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrātyāgacittānutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtānupālanatayā /
T04sanssr_pu:847: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā yan na sarvasattvopajīvyaṃ syād iti //
T04sanssr_pu:849: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca bodhipariṇāmanā /
T04sanssr_pu:852: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittotpādās tān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmīti idam annāgatakauśalyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:853: tad evaṃ caitasikenābhyāsena sarvatyāgādhimuktiṃ paripūrye tyāgacittavegāpannena kāyaprayogeṇotsṛṣṭasarvaparigrahaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:854: sarvaparigrahamūlād bhavaduṣkhād vimukto mukta ity ucyate /
T04sanssr_pu:855: annuttarāṃś cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān nānākārānantān laukikalokottarān sukhasaṃpatpravarṣān anubhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:856: tena cātmabhāvādinā [doubtful] vaḍiṣāmiṣeneva svayam annabhigatopabhogenāpy ākṛṣya parān api tārayati //
T04sanssr_pu:862: evam eṣām ātmabhāvādīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā /
T04sanssr_pu:870: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitaiṣikatayā samanvāgato bodhisatvo jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karotīti //
T04sanssr_pu:872: śakaṭam iva bhārodvahanārthaṃ kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā vāḍhavyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:878: kalyāṇamitrasandhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisatvā na patanti durgatiṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:880: kalyāṇamitrapraticchannā abhyudgatā bhavanti lokāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsitā bodhisatvā asaṃpramoṣacāriṇo bhavanti sarvabodhisatvacaryāsu /
T04sanssr_pu:884: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratipraśrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni /
T04sanssr_pu:902: kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:906: ata evāryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandyānnekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:907: pradakṣiṇīkrṭya sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣum avalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punar avalokayan niyataṃ
T04sanssr_pu:908: praṇipatan namasyann avanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan paribhāvayann udānam
T04sanssr_pu:910: guṇān abhimukhīkurvan nigamayann atra sann anusmaran dṛḍhīkurvann avijahan manasāgamayann
T04sanssr_pu:911: upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran darśanam abhilaṣan svaranimittam udgṛhṇan yāvat
T04sanssr_pu:913: tathā kalyāṇamitrāgataṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyann aśrumukho rudan yāvan meghasya dramitasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:915: iha śāriputra bodhisatvo dharmakāmatayā nāsti tal loke ratnaṃ yan na parityajati /
T04sanssr_pu:916: nāsti tat kāyopasthānaṃ yan na karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:918: nāsti tad vākkarma yan notsahate ācāryopādhyāyagauravatayā //
T04sanssr_pu:922: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyacchedāyaiṣa dharmaḥ saṃvartatae iti ratnacittam utpādya bhaiṣajyacittam utpādya /
T04sanssr_pu:924: eṣṭavyaś cāsmābhiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ glānyavyupaśamāyaivaṃrūpo dharma iti //
T04sanssr_pu:926: sacet punar gṛhapate pāṭhasvādhyāyārthiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid antikāc catuṣpādikāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:928: bodhisatvasaṃbhāropacayaṃ vā tena tasminn ācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhir
T04sanssr_pu:930: yadi tāvata evaṃ kalpāṃs tasyācāryasyopasthānaparicaryāṃ kuryād aśaṭhatayā sarvalābhasatkārapūjayā /
T04sanssr_pu:931: adyāpi gṛhapate na pratipūritam ācāryasyācāryagauravaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:934: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:936: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva evaṃrūpair guṇair gauravamanasikārair gacchann anupūrveṇānyatamanagaram anuprāptas /
T04sanssr_pu:938: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyānena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya satkāraṃ kuryāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:939: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe
T04sanssr_pu:940: saṃsāre 'parimāṇāni yāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānam anubhūtāni na punar evaṃrūpāṇāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:941: dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā satvānāṃ satkārāya //
T04sanssr_pu:942: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām āsa /
T04sanssr_pu:943: kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ kaḥ puruṣeṇārthika iti peyālaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:944: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:945: yadātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadaikāntaṃ gatvā prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ cāvadad /
T04sanssr_pu:946: aho vatāsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyāpi kretāraṃ na labhāmahe /
T04sanssr_pu:947: atha khalu śakro devānām indro māṇavakarūpeṇa yāvat sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:948: kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravarttayamānaḥ sthitaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:950: ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe / peyālaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:951: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:952: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:953: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca /
T04sanssr_pu:956: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ cātmānaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:957: yan mayātmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya cāsthimajjāyāś ca //
T04sanssr_pu:958: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:959: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te ita ātmabhāvād arthaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:960: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:961: viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvāsthi bhettuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:963: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikopariprāsādatalagatādrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisatvas tenopasaṃkramyaitad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:964: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsīti /
T04sanssr_pu:965: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha /
T04sanssr_pu:966: kā punas te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate /
T04sanssr_pu:968: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣayti /
T04sanssr_pu:969: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ / peyālaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:970: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:972: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:973: ekaikasyāpi kulaputraivaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālikopamān api kalpān evam ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:974: tathodārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:975: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
T04sanssr_pu:976: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:977: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat /
T04sanssr_pu:979: sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkam utpādayām āsa /
T04sanssr_pu:980: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkam utpādayām āsa /
T04sanssr_pu:982: kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyutthāsyati /
T04sanssr_pu:983: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrāsau
T04sanssr_pu:984: kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca
T04sanssr_pu:986: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikā pramukhāṇi pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyām everyāpathābhyāṃ kālam atināmayām āsuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:987: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo divyaṃ nirghoṣam aśrauṣīd itaḥ saptame
T04sanssr_pu:988: divase dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'smāt samādher vyutthāya madhye nagarasya
T04sanssr_pu:990: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:991: prītisaumanasyajātas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayām āsa sārddhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:992: pañcabhir dārikāśatair dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayām āsa saptaratnamayaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:993: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:994: na codakaṃ samantāt paryeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñced /
T04sanssr_pu:995: yathāpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tat sarvam udakam antardhāpitaṃ apy eva nāmāsyodakam
T04sanssr_pu:996: alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vānyathātvaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:997: bhaved yenāsya kuśalamūlāntardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni /
T04sanssr_pu:998: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaitad abhūt /
T04sanssr_pu:999: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1002: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye nipatatu /
T04sanssr_pu:1004: varaṃ khalu punar mamāyaṃ kāya evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu na ca niḥsāmarthyakriyayā /
T04sanssr_pu:1005: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni /
T04sanssr_pu:1006: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu bhidyantāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1007: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat /
T04sanssr_pu:1009: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvam abhūt /
T04sanssr_pu:1012: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na parityaktavyam api jīvitahetor iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1013: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrānutsargād ātmabhāvādīnāṃ rakṣādikaṃ kāryaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1014: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ sūtreṣv eva dṛśyante /
T04sanssr_pu:1015: teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānīti vacanāt /
T04sanssr_pu:1016: tasmāt tadannīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyāpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyādaraḥ kāryaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1017: tad anena kalyāṇamitrānutsargeṇa sūtrāntadarśanena ca sarvaḥ saddharmaparigraha ukto bhavati //
T04sanssr_pu:1019: yābhir akṣaraniruktibhiḥ so 'nnabhilāpyo dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām akṣaraniruktīnāṃ yadā dhāraṇaṃ deśanā yāvad /
T04sanssr_pu:1021: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakā eṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ deśayitāraḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1022: pratipattisārāś ca teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam utthānam
T04sanssr_pu:1023: upasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśrūṣā ārakṣā parigrahaś cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1027: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1029: punar aparaṃ kulaputrāpratihatasantānasya sarvasatvapramokṣabuddher nirāmiṣacittasya parebhyo dharmadānam ayam api saddharmaparigrahaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1030: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā dharmadeśanāhetuko vāntaśa ekakramavyatihāro 'ntaśa ekocchvāsapraśvāso vā /
T04sanssr_pu:1033: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣā ekāgrībhāvo damaḥ śama upaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ / peyālaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1034: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya dharmasyāparigraho 'nnupādānam ayam api saddharmaparigraha ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:1039: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [doubtful] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatva ity avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1041: yāny apīmāni bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisatvapraṇidhānāni tāny ekasmin mahāpraṇidhāne upanikṣiptāny antargatāny anupratiṣṭhāni yad uta saddharmaparigrahe /
T04sanssr_pu:1044: syād yathāpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyālpo 'pi marmaṇi prahāro /
T04sanssr_pu:1046: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho vedhanīyo bhavati śokāvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1047: nāhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokāvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1049: punar āha / syād yathāpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate coccatvena vipulatvena ca
T04sanssr_pu:1050: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca gṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho
T04sanssr_pu:1051: navayānasaṃprasthitānām api kāyajīvitasāpekṣāṇāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān
T04sanssr_pu:1054: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1057: sa śūnyakṣetreṣu na jātu jāyate sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1058: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
T04sanssr_pu:1059: jātismaro bhavati mahātmadharmā pravrajyalābhī bhavate punaḥ punaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1062: lābhī ca bhotī vidudhāraṇīye na naśyate kalpaśatebhi yacchubham /
T04sanssr_pu:1064: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapālo manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī /
T04sanssr_pu:1065: sukhena saukhyena sa bodhi budhyate saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
T04sanssr_pu:1066: dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇāḥ aninditāṅgo bhavate vicakṣaṇaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1067: na tasya tṛptiṃ labhi prekṣamāṇāḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
T04sanssr_pu:1068: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na coddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:1069: asaṃgṛhītaḥ kuśalaḥ śatebhiḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1076: tatreti saddharmaparigrahe varttamānasyātmabhāvarakṣā cintyate yathā parān na nāśayet /
T04sanssr_pu:1077: idaṃ ca annarthavivarjanam āryagaganagañjasūtre saddharmadhāraṇodyatair bodhisatvair bhāṣitaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1084: uccagghanāṃ tarjanāṃ ca avarṇam ayaśāṃsi ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1085: sarvāṃs tān marṣayiṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1091: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1092: kāruṇyaṃ ca kariṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam //
T04sanssr_pu:1096: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi //
T04sanssr_pu:1099: dānais tathāpi satkāraiḥ paripācyeha tān narān /
T04sanssr_pu:1103: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1105: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1107: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
T04sanssr_pu:1109: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1113: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1114: ete dharmā na cāsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana //
T04sanssr_pu:1115: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1116: bhūtāṃ codana saṃśrutya idaṃ sūtraṃ pratikṣipan //
T04sanssr_pu:1118: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam //
T04sanssr_pu:1120: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot //
T04sanssr_pu:1123: tasmin kāle vayaṃ kaṣṭe tyaktvā kāyaṃ sajīvitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1128: ye cāpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1130: adhimānīn na seveta [doubtful] vinayec cāgame sthitān /
T04sanssr_pu:1134: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet /
T04sanssr_pu:1135: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet //
T04sanssr_pu:1136: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [doubtful] /
T04sanssr_pu:1138: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1139: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cānye tādṛśā janāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1140: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1142: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
T04sanssr_pu:1143: na caikaḥ praviśet tatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1144: ayaṃ cāparo 'nnartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmoktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1145: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyāciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
T04sanssr_pu:1147: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1149: apy eva nāmāyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā romaharṣo vāsya bhaved iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1151: punar aparam anyavijñānasaṃjñino likhiṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1152: na vayam atrāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1153: evaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇā uccagghanto yāvat paryavāpsyantīti mārakarma /
T04sanssr_pu:1158: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.ṃ dharmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:1160: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca neti neyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1161: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako maheccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpeccha iti neyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1162: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmety uktaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1167: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato 'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1168: so 'lpārthatayālpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto
T04sanssr_pu:1169: bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe vā dharmasāṃkathhye vārthaviniścayakathāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1173: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti /
T04sanssr_pu:1176: sa tatra nātmārthāya pratipanno bhavati na parārthāya /
T04sanssr_pu:1177: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasyāraṇyavāsapratisaṃyuktaḥ saptamo mārāṅkuśa iti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1178: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste /
T04sanssr_pu:1179: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1182: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenāvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1183: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1186: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbhotsyase /
T04sanssr_pu:1187: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
T04sanssr_pu:1189: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate yan nirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyād /
T04sanssr_pu:1192: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
T04sanssr_pu:1193: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam annadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārāṅkuśa iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1194: yena caivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāva eva bhavaty ata eva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1196: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1201: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmārambho 'tivelāyāṃ vāparipakvādhimukter vā duṣkarakarmārambhas tad yathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1204: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt //
T04sanssr_pu:1207: nāpy akāla ity ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva notpādyābhyāsānārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
T04sanssr_pu:1208: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś cātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1213: kathaṃ ca kulaputrātra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1215: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjopasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1216: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1226: tena ca kulaputraitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam
T04sanssr_pu:1228: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmādidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1230: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py annarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
T04sanssr_pu:1231: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1234: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca satvānām avarṇāyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāyāśayeneti asya vivarjanam atroktaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1235: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1238: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:1240: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1242: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1246: na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1250: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:1251: svapnāntare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1252: āha / yeṣu viratisthāneṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā /
T04sanssr_pu:1253: samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
T04sanssr_pu:1255: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1256: nihatamānaś ca bhavatīrṣyamātsaryaparivarjakaś ca bhavati parasaṃpadaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavatīti /
T04sanssr_pu:1257: idam eva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataram asaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yat tatraiva ratnakūṭe 'bhihitam /
T04sanssr_pu:1261: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehīti //
T04sanssr_pu:1262: avasādo 'py annartha etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1265: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś cādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān /
T04sanssr_pu:1267: tan nāham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1269: ye 'pi te 'bhisaṃbuddhās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ye cābhisaṃbuddhyante ye vābhisaṃbhotsyante 'pīdṛśenaiva nayena īdṛśyā pratipadā
T04sanssr_pu:1272: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāham annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1274: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣūdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1275: udārādhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1276: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1279: yasya adhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1280: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya //
T04sanssr_pu:1281: sa itaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1282: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham //
T04sanssr_pu:1285: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:1288: annantā buddhabodhir nānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1291: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā /
T04sanssr_pu:1292: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1293: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikās teṣāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1294: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1295: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
T04sanssr_pu:1297: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo
T04sanssr_pu:1298: bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā praṇītabhojaneṣu
T04sanssr_pu:1300: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur yogācārī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1301: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇānulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1302: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe na uccaśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1305: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogācārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1306: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dātavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1311: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena cāsya bhavitavyaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1313: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1314: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1316: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābha utsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham ekamānasaṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanssr_pu:1318: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ity ājñā /
T04sanssr_pu:1319: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:1320: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1322: yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1324: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1325: tat tatraiva tathāgatacaitye vātātapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
T04sanssr_pu:1326: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1327: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nāpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa
T04sanssr_pu:1328: vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyānām [doubtful] aiśvaryād ājñaptiṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1329: dadāti sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā narakagāmī bhavatīti /
T04sanssr_pu:1330: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:1331: daṇḍakarmabhayatarjitaṃ bhikṣuṃ karoty akālapreṣaṇam akālajñaptiṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:1332: sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1337: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayomayāni nikhātāni bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1338: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatāgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālānukālaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:1341: sa tenākuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1343: sa udvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1344: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1345: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ veti //
T04sanssr_pu:1347: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
T04sanssr_pu:1350: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
T04sanssr_pu:1353: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣākārān patrākārān phalākārān te 'pi bhikṣava āsan /
T04sanssr_pu:1354: tair api sāṃghikāni vṛkṣapatrapus.paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1355: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
T04sanssr_pu:1356: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjanyākārāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1357: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭākāraṃ sa śrāmaṇeraka āsīt /
T04sanssr_pu:1360: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1362: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1363: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1364: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1365: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalākāraṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīt /
T04sanssr_pu:1368: sa tenoktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitveti /
T04sanssr_pu:1370: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā dāsyāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:1372: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evāham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1376: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam āpatsyatīti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1380: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1383: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1387: apy eva nāma etat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1388: tenātyayam atyayato na deśitaṃ tena karmaṇodūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1391: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1392: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryābhibhūtena lābhaḥ saṃparivartitaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1394: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1395: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati //
T04sanssr_pu:1401: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1404: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
T04sanssr_pu:1407: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatīyaṃ dvitīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1408: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śikṣādhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1409: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatīyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1410: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1411: vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
T04sanssr_pu:1413: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarānyataraṃ karmotpādayatīyaṃ caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1415: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatīyaṃ pañcamī mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1416: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotīyaṃ mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1417: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo /
T04sanssr_pu:1418: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1419: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1421: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1422: te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1423: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1424: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1425: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
T04sanssr_pu:1426: te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
T04sanssr_pu:1428: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1431: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:1433: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
T04sanssr_pu:1434: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1435: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1436: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /
T04sanssr_pu:1438: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1439: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1441: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /
T04sanssr_pu:1443: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1444: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1445: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1447: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
T04sanssr_pu:1449: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
T04sanssr_pu:1450: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1452: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /
T04sanssr_pu:1455: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1456: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1457: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1458: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti
T04sanssr_pu:1461: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1463: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1464: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1465: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatraiva maraṇaṃ nigacched
T04sanssr_pu:1466: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmā īrṣyāhetos tad vadanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1467: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1468: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā īrṣyāhetor annṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
T04sanssr_pu:1470: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā
T04sanssr_pu:1472: kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti paṭhanti svādhyāyanti
T04sanssr_pu:1474: ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvaivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavopadiśāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:1475: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi /
T04sanssr_pu:1476: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
T04sanssr_pu:1477: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇāham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā //
T04sanssr_pu:1479: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1485: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahāṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1486: āhārārthaṃ sa udāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam annāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt
T04sanssr_pu:1488: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā
T04sanssr_pu:1489: lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām
T04sanssr_pu:1490: āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayāpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1491: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1492: yaś ca tān sevate sa sātisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1494: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālā amātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1495: bahuvidheṣu dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuṣu saṃdṛśyante te tyāgamadamattā mānamadadarpeṇa kṣatriyaṃ vibhedayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1499: tenopadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante /
T04sanssr_pu:1502: ye kṣatriyacaṇḍālāḥ śramaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ praduṣyanti tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1505: mahākaruṇānetrīprajñāpāramitaśikṣopāyakauśalyaśikṣāḥ yāś cāpareṣu sūtreṣu śikṣā upadiṣṭās tā apahāya /
T04sanssr_pu:1506: tathārūpāṃ dharmayuktiṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ viheṭhanārthapūrvakaṃ kriyākāraṃ prajñapayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1510: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nopaśamyanti na tanūbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1511: tatkāle punas te bhikṣava āśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1512: ācāravipannā bhavanti dṛṣṭivipannā bhavanti taddhetoḥ śaithilikā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1516: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti mānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1517: te ca prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1518: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antike praduṣyati avadhyāyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1519: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svādhyāyābhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1530: yadi te bodhisatvā ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā darśanam asyākāṅkṣeran /
T04sanssr_pu:1532: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaḥkuryuḥ nāma cāsya parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa
T04sanssr_pu:1533: kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇāgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ sthāsyati /
T04sanssr_pu:1534: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya yathā samutthitās tā āpattīḥ pratideśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1537: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:1539: tenādikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sāparādhena paścime yāme utthāyāsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1542: aruṇa aruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahoditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe māṃ karuṇayāchādayasva /
T04sanssr_pu:1543: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /
T04sanssr_pu:1544: mama svapnāntare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenāham upāyenāpattiṃ pratideśayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:1546: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahodgate 'ruṇe iha jambudvīpe ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasyeha samāgamo bhavati svarūpeṇa ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1547: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnāntare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlāpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānopāyena /
T04sanssr_pu:1549: yenopāyakauśalyena sa ādikarmiko bodhisatvas tatraiva bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:1550: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1553: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālānusāri vā dhūpayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1554: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditvā ime mantrapadāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1563: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika sarvāśāṃ me sthāpaya /
T04sanssr_pu:1571: yadi kṣatriyādayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ cādhikyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1574: kathaṃ vā taddoṣāt sāmvarikā api gṛhyante /
T04sanssr_pu:1576: yeṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrākoṭitāḥ svanāmagrahaṇadarśanād bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1577: paraḥparatas tu sarvaiḥ sarvā āpattayaḥ parihartavyāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1578: yena vā prakṛtimahāsāvadyatayāsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikā ity alam anayā cintayā //
T04sanssr_pu:1580: kiṃ vāpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:1582: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlāpattiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1583: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlāpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum /
T04sanssr_pu:1584: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyaitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārān abhavyo buddhabhūmau parinirvātum iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1585: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇadhāraṇārtham ekīyamatānāṃ ca saṃgrahakārikā ucyante //
T04sanssr_pu:1599: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt //
T04sanssr_pu:1600: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1609: yo mahābrahman mamoddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur anubhūtaḥ kaśambakajāto 'śramaṇaḥ śramaṇapratijñaḥ abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1611: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyāpi sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1612: kiṃ cāpi sa apātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena kāṣāyavastraprāvaraṇeryāpathena
T04sanssr_pu:1613: darśanahetunāpi bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ vividhakuśalamūlopastambhanakaraḥ sugatimārgadarśako bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1614: tasmād yo mamoddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya nānujānāmi cakravarttir
T04sanssr_pu:1615: ājñām api yan mamoddiśya pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇāpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1617: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1620: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśa iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1622: ye mamoddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva sāparādhā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1625: sarvabuddhair adhiṣṭhito 'yaṃ mokṣadhvajo yad uta raktakāṣāyavastram iti /
T04sanssr_pu:1627: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1628: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān
T04sanssr_pu:1629: pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto
T04sanssr_pu:1631: tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1635: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1637: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrābhūtāṃś ca praharitavantaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1643: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ tata asthānaṃ sāditāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1645: asmābhir bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakā apatrabhūtāḥ pātrabhūtāś ca sāparādhikāś
T04sanssr_pu:1646: cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1648: tad vayam etarhi karmāvaraṇaśeṣāṃ bhagavato 'ntike pratideśayāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1651: uddharatu bhagavān asmān annantapāpebhya iti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:1653: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1654: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś cājihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca nityadāsaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1655: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś coṣṭraś ca āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau //
T04sanssr_pu:1657: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭādhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyāryamārgacittasyāntarāyaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:1659: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyaiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyāntarāyaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:1668: tad yathāgniśikhācarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye 'gniśikṣāmadhyagatā na dahyante saṃhṛṣṭatarāś ca nārakeyāṇāṃ kapālaṃ bhittvā rudhiraṃ pibanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1669: kapālāntaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā jvalitamastakaluṅgān pibanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1670: jihvāmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryābhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1671: sāpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā /
T04sanssr_pu:1672: evam arthānurūpasaṃjñā dantotpāṭakā nāma kaṇṭhanāḍyapakarṣakā nāma /
T04sanssr_pu:1678: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti krandamānānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1679: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1682: keśoṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti //
T04sanssr_pu:1683: sa evam avīcipradeśas trīṇi yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pakṣibhairavapakṣo nāma /
T04sanssr_pu:1684: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bhakṣyate saṃbhavati ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1685: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1686: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:1687: trāṇānveṣī śaraṇānveṣī paritrāṇānveṣī samantata ekādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1688: karmapāśabandhanabaddhaḥ samantataḥ śatrubhir āvṛtaḥ kāntāram anuprapannaḥ sarvasmān
T04sanssr_pu:1689: narakapuñjād adhikataraṃ vyasanam abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
T04sanssr_pu:1692: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1693: tasyaivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvāṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1694: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi yojanasahasrāṇi /
T04sanssr_pu:1697: yāvat tasyaivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi gacchanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1698: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrāṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
T04sanssr_pu:1699: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrārāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tāni cakrāṇi śarīraṃ prāpya bhramanti / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1700: pratyekaṃ sarvāṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale cāsya śaṅkubhir bhidyete /
T04sanssr_pu:1703: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1708: sa eṣa duṣkṛtakarmāntacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1711: sa evaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitāṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā taddraviṇam anudhāvati /
T04sanssr_pu:1712: sa karmakṛtair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate śastrajālamadhyagataḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaḥ pāṭyate viśasyate dahyate 'sthyavaśeṣaḥ kriyate /
T04sanssr_pu:1713: na cāsyānnādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1715: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:1716: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā /
T04sanssr_pu:1718: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1721: gṛhītvā cauṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nāvaśiṣṭaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1725: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgāgner na nivartate /
T04sanssr_pu:1726: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
T04sanssr_pu:1727: na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1728: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayāyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
