T04sanssr_pu:1731: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:1732: yāvat / strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
T04sanssr_pu:1733: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadīcchet sukham ātmana iti //
T04sanssr_pu:1735: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti tasmāj jihvām apakarṣayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1736: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1737: tasya mṛṣāvādasya balena tasyāś ca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāv ānāhayanti pradīptāyomayyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:1738: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptāgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyāntargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
T04sanssr_pu:1740: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
T04sanssr_pu:1741: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na cāsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatīti vistaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1742: tasyaivaṃ pracaṇḍām vedanām anubhavato 'nnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi sā ca jihvā kṛṣyate /
T04sanssr_pu:1743: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
T04sanssr_pu:1744: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu dahyamāno nimajjan /
T04sanssr_pu:1745: tasyaivaṃ duḥkhārttasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya punar api yamapuruṣāḥ prādurbhavanti mudgarāsipāṇayaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:1746: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantīty ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:1747: paiśunyavipākas tu yathaiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni jihveti viśeṣas tu /
T04sanssr_pu:1748: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1750: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktākṣaraṃ jihvāvirahita ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:1752: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1753: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti /
T04sanssr_pu:1754: sa ca jighansārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparisrutāṃ tām eva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati /
T04sanssr_pu:1755: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
T04sanssr_pu:1756: atha sa bhūmau vedanārttaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate krandate /
T04sanssr_pu:1757: tasyaivaṃ vedanārttasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duṣkhārttasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtam upabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante
T04sanssr_pu:1758: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā /
T04sanssr_pu:1759: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgatam //
T04sanssr_pu:1762: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati /
T04sanssr_pu:1764: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvāntrāṇi dahati /
T04sanssr_pu:1769: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgataṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:1770: yā na [doubtful] satyavatī nityaṃ na cādhyayanatatparā /
T04sanssr_pu:1771: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā /
T04sanssr_pu:1774: atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyaivaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:1776: tataḥ sa nārakas tenaiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ /

T04sanssr_pu:2070: yaś cānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekasya bhikṣor ekadivasam āhāraṃ dadyād /
T04sanssr_pu:2073: sacen mañjuśrīr daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasatvā utpāṭitākṣā bhaveyuḥ parikalpam upādāya /
T04sanssr_pu:2074: atha kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ maitracittas tāny akṣīṇi janayet parikalpam upādāya /
T04sanssr_pu:2075: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktaṃ bodhisatvaṃ prasannacittaḥ paśyed /
T04sanssr_pu:2077: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣu sarvasatvān bandhanāgārapraviviṣṭān bandhanāgārān mocayitvā cakravartisukhe sthāpayed brahmatvasukhe vā /
T04sanssr_pu:2078: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya prasannacitto darśanābhilāṣī bhaved varṇaṃ cāsyodāhared /
T04sanssr_pu:2081: yaḥ punar bhadanta bhagavan kṣatriyakalyāṇo vāmātyakalyāṇo vā bhaṭṭakalyāṇo vā śramaṇakalyāṇo vā brāhmaṇakalyāṇo vā paraṃ rakṣaty ātmānaṃ rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati /
T04sanssr_pu:2082: bhagavacchāsane pātrabhūtam apātrabhūtaṃ vā yāvan muṇḍaṃ kāṣāyakhaṇḍaprāvṛtaṃ parirakṣati śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati śrāvakakathāṃ evaṃ pratyekabuddhakathāṃ śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:2083: mahāyānakathāṃ ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitān pudgalān śīlavato guṇāḍhyān yuktamuktapratibhānān
T04sanssr_pu:2084: taiḥ sārddhaṃ ramati krīḍati paripṛcchati paripraśnayati teṣāṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyate // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2087: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścit puruṣa utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2088: yaḥ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2089: dānaṃ dadyāt tathaiva madhyāhnasamaye tathaiva sāyāhnasamaye dānaṃ dadyād anena paryāyeṇa
T04sanssr_pu:2091: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputrāpi nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet //
T04sanssr_pu:2093: bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaved aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2094: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacic chakyaṃ pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ anyatra tathāgatena //
T04sanssr_pu:2096: yas tu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:2098: yāvad vipulataram apramāṇataram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2099: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrī rakṣati sa rakṣaty ātmānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2100: rakṣati parāṃś ca rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati mama śāsanaṃ śrāvakān pātrabhūtān apātrabhūtān vā yāvan muṇḍān kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtān api rakṣati
T04sanssr_pu:2102: yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati /
T04sanssr_pu:2104: surālayaṃ ca prāpayati ciraṃ cāyuḥ pālayati /
T04sanssr_pu:2109: nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrair buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisatvaiś ca mahāsatvaiś ca sārddhaṃ samavadhānagato bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2110: satataṃ kalyāṇamitrāvirahito na cireṇa yathābhiprāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate //
T04sanssr_pu:2112: yāvat piśācendrāḥ saparivārā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivam āhuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2113: ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhy annāgate 'dhvani yāvat paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvad gahapatikalyāṇāḥ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:2115: vayam api sarve saparivārās taṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvad gahapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhir ākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ paripālayiṣyāmo vardhayiṣyāmaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2117: āyuś cāsya vardhayiṣyāmaḥ āyurantarāyaṃ ca dharmeṇa nivārayiṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2118: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ ca upabhogaparibhogaṃ caiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsampadaṃ ca vardhāpayiṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2125: yas tv eṣāṃ buddhaputrāṇāṃ naraḥ kurvīta apriyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2126: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaraṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2128: na cātra viśeṣahetuḥ kaścid upadarśayituṃ śakyatae ity alaṃ vikalpena //
T04sanssr_pu:2130: āvaraṇaṃ mañjuśrīr ucyate rāga āvaraṇaṃ dveṣa āvaraṇaṃ moha āvaraṇaṃ dānam āvaraṇaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñā āvaraṇaṃ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:2131: tat kasya hetoḥ bālapṛthagjanā mañjuśrīr dānaṃ dadānā matsariṇām antike 'prasādaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2136: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyāprasādaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2138: te kṣāntiṃ bhāvayantaḥ kṣāntimadenātmānam utkarṣayanti pramādyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2142: te vīryam ārabhamāṇā ātmānam utkarṣayanti parān paṃsayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2143: kusīdā ime bhikṣavo viharanty annabhiyuktāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuñjānāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2145: te tena vīryārambheṇātmānam utkarṣayanti paraṃ ca paṃsayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2147: te dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānās tatra dhyānasamāpattau spṛhām utpādayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2159: saced bodhisatvasyāntike hīnasaṃjñām utpādayati ātmani codārasaṃjñāṃ kṣiṇoty ātmānaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ ca gṛhṇāti /
T04sanssr_pu:2160: iha bodhisatvena bodhisatvam avavadatānuśāsatā vā śāstṛsaṃjñām upasthāpyāvavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2163: na devaputra bodhisatvaḥ kvacid eva kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti /
T04sanssr_pu:2165: annutpāditabodhicitte 'pi tāvad bodhir bhavye satve 'vamanyanā pratiṣiddhā /
T04sanssr_pu:2169: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pāñcagatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2170: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu yadi vā manuṣyeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:2174: ayaṃ puruṣapudgalo yāvad iyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayiṣyati // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2175: iyadbhiś ca asaṃkhyeyakalpaśatasahasrair bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2178: atha khalv āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:2181: na hy asmākam etaj jñānaṃ pravarttate /
T04sanssr_pu:2184: tato vayaṃ bhagavann ajānānās tathārūpeṣu hīnasaṃjñām utpādayema /
T04sanssr_pu:2187: sādhu sādhu kāśyapa subhāṣitā te iyaṃ vāk /
T04sanssr_pu:2188: idaṃ ca mayā kāśyapārthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānena yuṣmākam evaṃ dharmo deśito /
T04sanssr_pu:2190: yac chīghraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan /
T04sanssr_pu:2191: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2192: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisatvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā sarvasatvānām antike śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:2193: mātra kaścid bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalo bhavet tena tatrātmā rakṣitavya iti /
T04sanssr_pu:2194: yasya tu niyatam eva bodhiprāpticihnam asti tatra sutarām avamanyanā rakṣitavyā //
T04sanssr_pu:2196: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāś ca kurvanti jinasya stūpān /
T04sanssr_pu:2197: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarāśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca kārayanti //
T04sanssr_pu:2198: siktāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye kecid uddiśya jināna stūpān /
T04sanssr_pu:2210: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2213: sugatānam uddiśyatha pūjanārthaṃ gītaṃ ca gītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2214: sarve ca te buddha abhūṣi loke //
T04sanssr_pu:2231: te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhina / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2233: tad yathā vāḍiśikena mahaty udakasarasi matsyākarṣaṇārthaṃ sāmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet samanantaraprakṣiptaṃ ca matsyena nigīrṇaṃ bhavet
T04sanssr_pu:2234: kiṃ cāpi sa matsya udakasarasi bhramaty atha ca punar vaddha eva sa vaktavyo dṛḍhena sūtreṇa sthalagatadaṇḍasunibaddhena /
T04sanssr_pu:2235: yat sa vāḍiśika āgatya tena sūtralāghavena jānāti /
T04sanssr_pu:2237: tam enaṃ sūtrād gṛhītvā sthalagataṃ karoti yathākāmakaraṇāya paribhogāya /
T04sanssr_pu:2238: evam eva ye satvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlam avaropayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2240: kiṃ cāpi te satvā duṣkṛtena karmāvaraṇenākṣaṇeṣūpapannā bhavanty atha ca buddhā bhagavantas
T04sanssr_pu:2241: tān satvān bauddhena jñānena saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārodakasarasa uddhṛtya
T04sanssr_pu:2246: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisatvenāpi satā navaka āryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2250: katham ekatra vandya vandakatvaṃ na virudhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2253: kiṃ ca buddhānām apy evam iṣyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2258: yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīs tathāgatabhāṣitadharme kasmiṃścic chobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:2263: ya evaṃ vadatīdaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2264: na mayā pṛthak kaścid dharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprayukto mahāyānasaṃprayukto deśitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2265: tat te mohapuruṣā imaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2266: idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitam idaṃ pratyekabuddhānām idaṃ bodhisatvānām iti /
T04sanssr_pu:2270: dharmabhāṇakasyāsti pratibhānaṃ nāsti pratibhānam iti saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2272: apagate buddhotpāde nāsti dhāraṇīpratilambha iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2273: nāsti dharmabhāṇakasya dhāraṇīpratilambha iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2275: dharmabhāṇako na pratipattisaṃpanna iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2280: āloko 'sya dharmāṇāṃ na suvidita iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2281: mantreṇa mantram abudhyamānaḥ prativadatīti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2282: akṣarasaṃjñyā tathāgataśāsanaṃ nāvagāhata iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2285: akṣarasaṃjñayā kañcid adhimuktaṃ karoti kañcin na karotīti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2289: ihāsyāsti caryā ihāsya nāsti caryeti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2290: idaṃ sūktam idam asūktam iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2292: anena buddhavacanasamaya ukto nānena buddhavacanasamaya ukta iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati iti hi mañjuśrīr yāvat kiñcid vilopayati tāvad dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanssr_pu:2293: dharmabhāṇakasyedaṃ rūpam iti cintayati vadati bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
T04sanssr_pu:2296: yasya kasyacit kulaputra tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dharmaḥ pratibhāti yathādhimuktānāṃ satvānāṃ deśayituṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2297: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi yady ekasatvasyāpi ekaromaharṣo bhaved ekāśrupāto vā sarvaḥ sa tathāgatānubhāvena /
T04sanssr_pu:2298: tatra mohapuruṣā abodhisatvā bodhisatvapratijñā bodhisatvadūṣakā dharmastainyakuhakā evaṃ vakṣyanti dharmopadeśakebhyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2304: yo bodhisatvo dharmabhāṇakam apavādati buddhaṃ sa vigarhati dharmaṃ sa pratikṣipati saṃghaṃ sa jugupsati /
T04sanssr_pu:2306: buddhaṃ sa na draṣṭukāmo yo dharmabhāṇakam adraṣṭukāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2307: buddhasya so 'varṇaṃ bhāṣate yo dharmabhāṇakasyāvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:2308: buddhas tena parityakto bhavati yaḥ prathamacittotpādike 'pi bodhisatve pratighacittaṃ karotīti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2309: yo 'py ayaṃ maitreya ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisatvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2313: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājābhūd yena kapotārthaṃ śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni /
T04sanssr_pu:2317: yāni mayā maitreya bodhisatvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny upacitāni apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2321: tvaṃ tāvad ajita ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān śīlapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2322: kalpān kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān vīryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2332: evaṃvidhānarthaśravaṇabhayabhīrukaiḥ ādikarmikabodhisatvaiḥ samādānāni yathā gṛhītāni tathā kāryaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2334: ete vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa tathāgatasya purataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2336: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2337: vāpattyā codayiṣyāmo bhūtena vābhūtena vā visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2338: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalam avamanyemāvarṇaṃ cāsya bhāṣema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhaved arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:2339: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2340: vā pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ paricārayantaṃ daṣṭvāprasādaṃ kuryāma vilekhaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2341: vā cittasyotpādayemāgauravaṃ votpādayema na ca tatra śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayema /
T04sanssr_pu:2343: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa mitrakulabhikṣād akulanidānaṃ bodhisatvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kāyapīḍāṃ cittapīḍāṃ vā kuryāma visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2344: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā ekenāpy amanojñavacanenābhāṣema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2345: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa triḥkṛtvo rātreḥ triḥkṛtvo divasya bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na namasyema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet
T04sanssr_pu:2346: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇāsya vratasamādānasya kṛtaśo rājyapratilambhaṃ vā dhanapratilambhaṃ vā kāyajīvitaṃ vā na parityajema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2347: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā pudgalam avamanyema /
T04sanssr_pu:2348: vayaṃ viśiṣṭatarā naite iti visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2349: saced vayaṃ bhagavan nīcacittāś caṇḍālasadṛśacittā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2350: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇātmānam utkarṣayema paraṃ vā paṃsayema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2351: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa vyāpādavigrahabhayād yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā na palāyema īritāḥ samānā visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet
T04sanssr_pu:2352: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa śīlavantam ātmānaṃ pratijānīma bahuśrutaṃ vā dhutaguṇinaṃ vānyatarānyatareṇa vā guṇenātmānam udbhāvayema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2353: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa praticchannakalyāṇā vivṛtapāpā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhaved arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ // pe
T04sanssr_pu:2354: tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āmantrayate sma /
T04sanssr_pu:2355: karmāvaraṇaṃ maitreya kṣapayitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ samādānaṃ kartavyaṃ yathā ebhiḥ kulaputraiḥ kṛtam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2370: tair na dvitīyasya bodhisatvasya sarvacaryāsu vipratipattavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2374: idaṃ ca khalu kulaputrārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgata evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:2376: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2377: yaḥ kulaputrātmānaṃ rakṣitukāmas tena na kasyacic caryā vivecayitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:2382: atha tāvad eva bahūni śatasahasrāṇi vidvāṃsaḥ satvā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivam āhuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2383: vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavataḥ purata evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kurmaḥ yāvac ciraṃ vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan saṃsāre saṃsarema tāvan mātra pratilabdhakṣāntikāmā rājasthānaṃ pratilabhema /
T04sanssr_pu:2393: mā kuṭumbijyeṣṭhasthānaṃ yāvat sarvaśo vayaṃ mā satvānām adhipatisthānaṃ pratilabhema yāvan na kṣāntipratilabdhāḥ syāma /
T04sanssr_pu:2394: yato nidānaṃ vayam evaṃrūpam atigāḍhaṃ karma buddhānāṃ śāsanam ākṣipema /
T04sanssr_pu:2397: nāsti pāpam akartavyaṃ kumārā teṣu bheṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:2398: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārddhaṃ kuryāḥ tvaṃ kāli paścime //
T04sanssr_pu:2401: varṣāgraṃ paripṛcchitvā yas te vṛddhataro bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:2403: na teṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed bodhimaṇḍaṃ vipaśyatāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2404: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet //
T04sanssr_pu:2405: yady eṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed doṣāṃs teṣāṃ na kīrtayet /
T04sanssr_pu:2406: yādṛśaṃ kāhiti karma tādṛśaṃ lapsyate phalaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2408: pūrvābhāṣī bhaven nityaṃ hatamānaś ca sarvataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2409: cīvaraiḥ piṇḍapātaiś ca kuryāt teṣām anugrahaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2410: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyās tvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakā / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2411: yasya ca bodhicittotpādike gauravaṃ prasādaś ca notpadyete /
T04sanssr_pu:2415: eṣa dṛṣṭva jaravyādhipīḍitān prāṇino duṣkhaśatair upadrutān /
T04sanssr_pu:2422: tasya kṣema diśadaiśikaḥ prabhuḥ sārthavāha jagato bhaviṣyati //
T04sanssr_pu:2424: śūrasūta abhayasya dāyako daiśako hi jagato bhaviṣyati //
T04sanssr_pu:2431: āśaye dṛḍhatale pratiṣṭhito bodhicarya anupūrva udgataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2435: śuddhi vartti trimalattamo 'py ahaṃ maitrisnehasmṛtibhājanaṃ dṛḍham /
T04sanssr_pu:2438: bodhi aṅgam anupūrvasaṃbhavo buddhagarbha ayu saṃpravardhate //
T04sanssr_pu:2448: eṣa sarvajagamokṣaṇodyato eṣa te sada viśeṣa paṇḍitaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2450: mokṣamārgam upaneṣyate jagad yādṛśe guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2457: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne 'kṣato 'nnupahataḥ svastinā parimokṣyate //
T04sanssr_pu:2472: ādikarmikeṇa maitreya bodhisatvena prajñābalādhānaprāptena lābhasatkāraparivarjitena lābhasatkāradoṣadarśinā bhavitavyaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2478: iha maitreya bodhisatvena mahāsatvena rāgasaṃjanano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2501: ime evaṃrūpā maitreya lābhasatkāre ādīnavā ye bodhisatvena pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2504: alpecchasya hi maitreya imae evaṃrūpā doṣā na bhavanti na cāsyāntarāyā bhavanti buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2512: spaṣṭaś ca bhavati māyāśāṭhyaprahīṇo 'pramattaś ca bhavati pañcakāmaguṇadoṣadarśī yathāvādī tathākārī bhavaty āryavaṃśe sthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2514: imāṃ maitreya evaṃrūpām anuśaṃsāṃ viditvā paṇḍitena bodhisatvenādhyāśayenālpecchatāyāṃ rantavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2517: vijahya rāgaṃ vijahya doṣaṃ na tiṣṭhate saṃgaṇikāsu yogī /
T04sanssr_pu:2554: cittaṃ na kāyaś ca prasanna bhoti /
T04sanssr_pu:2579: na tasya jātū dṛḍha buddhi bhotī /
T04sanssr_pu:2592: bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2603: tasmād dhi bhāṣye tu ratiṃ vihāya /
T04sanssr_pu:2615: viheṭhayante ca vane vasantaṃ yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
T04sanssr_pu:2617: dharme ca chando na hi bhoti tasya /
T04sanssr_pu:2618: adharmakāyaś ca sa bhoti bhūyo yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti //
T04sanssr_pu:2626: ātmā tu jñātvā ca kusīdaprāptaḥ īrṣyāyate vīryabalair upetān /
T04sanssr_pu:2627: vīryānvitānāṃ ca avarṇa bhāṣate yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2650: bhakte ca coḍe ca bhavaty abhīkṣṇaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2655: yuktaiś ca mantraiḥ sa na vindate ratiṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2657: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:2658: suparīttaprajñās te bhagavan bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti vihīnaprajñā ye 'gradharmān varjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante //
T04sanssr_pu:2659: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:2661: evam etad yathā vadasi suparīttaprajñās te bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti ye 'gradharmān parivarjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante /
T04sanssr_pu:2662: api tv ārocayāmi te maitreya prativedayāmi te /
T04sanssr_pu:2663: na te bodhisatvās tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti yogo nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prahāṇaṃ nāsty adhyayanaṃ nāsti bāhuśrutyaparyeṣṭiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2664: api tu maitreya dhyānaprahāṇaprabhāvitaṃ tathāgataśāsanaṃ jñānasaṃskṛtaṃ jñānasamāhitaṃ abhiyogaprabhāvitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2666: ayuktayogānām etat karma saṃsārābhiratānāṃ yad uta vaiyāpṛtyaṃ laukikakṛtyapaligodhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2668: sacen maitreya vaiyāpṛtyābhirato bodhisatvaḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpair imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ pūrayet /
T04sanssr_pu:2669: nāhaṃ tenārādhito bhaveyaṃ na mānito nāpi satkṛtaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2670: pe / tatra jambūdvīpaḥ pūritaḥ syād vaiyāpṛtyakarair bodhisatvaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2672: jambūdvīpapramāṇaiś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyuktair bodhisatvair ekasya pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisatvasyopasthānaparicaryā kartavyā // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2674: duṣkaram etat karma yad uta prajñākarma /
T04sanssr_pu:2675: uttaraṃ niruttaraṃ sarvatrailokyaprativiśiṣṭam abhyudgataṃ tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvena yogārthikena vīryam ārabdhukāmena prajñāyām abhiyoktavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2681: doṣān imān samyag avetya paṇḍitaḥ sarvān prapañcān parivarjīta /
T04sanssr_pu:2686: na tatra vāsaṃ na niketu kuryān muhūrttamātraṃ stiya yatra kleśaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2689: na vo 'sti kṣetraṃ na kṛṣir vaṇijyā /
T04sanssr_pu:2691: na putra dhītā na ca vo 'sti bhāryā /
T04sanssr_pu:2692: na cāsya mitraṃ na ca bandhuvargaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2693: dāsyo na dāsā na ca īśvaratvaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2702: tasmād dhi kṣāntau janayeta vīryam // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2705: dharṣeti māraṃ sacalaṃ savāhanaṃ yo dhīru tasyaiva janeti kṣāntim / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2707: tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā paścimāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2712: tāvat piṇḍāya carati yāvad asya kāryasya prāptir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2713: anyatra yeṣu sthāneṣu caṇḍā vā kukkurās taruṇavatsā vā gāvaḥ prakṛtiduḥśīlā vā tiryagyonigatā /
T04sanssr_pu:2714: viheṭhanābhiprāyā vā strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jugupsitāni vā sthānāni /
T04sanssr_pu:2716: anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati yad dṛṣṭe 'pi bādhākara evaṃvidhe /
T04sanssr_pu:2718: atha yad evamādy annarthavarjanam uktaṃ kenaital labhyate sarvaniṣphalasyandavarjanāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2723: na hastalolupo bhavati na pādalolupaḥ hastapādasaṃyata iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2724: tathā daśadharmakasūtre 'pi deśitaṃ hastavikṣepaḥ pādavikṣepo 'dhāvanaṃ paridhāvanaṃ laṅghanaṃ plavanam idam ucyate kāyadauṣṭhulyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2725: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre tu yathā bodhisatvānāṃ parārthād anyat karma na kalpate /
T04sanssr_pu:2726: tathā spaṣṭam eva paridīpitaṃ yat kiñcid bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ kāyakarma yat kiñcid
T04sanssr_pu:2727: vākkarma yat kiñcin manaḥkarma tat sarvaṃ satvāvekṣitaṃ pravartate mahākaruṇādhipateyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2730: sa mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyayā sarvasatvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā ca // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:2734: tad yathāpi nāma chidrān mārutaḥ praviśati /
T04sanssr_pu:2735: evam eva yato yata eva cittasya chidraṃ bhavati tatas tata eva māro 'vatāraṃ labhate /
T04sanssr_pu:2737: tatreyam achidracittatā yad idaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ paripūrir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2744: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty atra prastāve yāni cānyāni punaḥ kānicid anyāny api cittavikṣepakarāṇi yāni samādhiskandhasya vipakṣāya saṃvartante /
T04sanssr_pu:2746: yāvad ime ucyante pāpakā akuśalā dharmā iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2757: sati satvārthe yad aṅgam annupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparāpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2762: yaḥ śrotā vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvaninārthaṃ jānāti /
T04sanssr_pu:2772: ayaṃ cādaraḥ śamathamāhātmyaṃ jñātvā tātparyeṇa jāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2778: annunnahanatā acapalatā acañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatā ājāneyatā ekāgratā
T04sanssr_pu:2780: yāvad īryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā /
T04sanssr_pu:2782: kiṃ punar asya śamasya māhātmyaṃ yathābhūtajñānajananaśaktiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2783: yasmāt samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty avadan muniḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2788: idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2789: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ paripūryāṃ caturāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2791: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cānnantāpāyādiduḥkhasamatikramānantalaukikalokottarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakam avagamya tadabhilāṣeṇātāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2796: yaś ca niṣphalaṃ varjayati tasyānnarthā na saṃbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:2797: tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2800: atraiva ca pravrajitabodhisatvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepa iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2802: yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2803: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:2804: yayā smṛtyā utpathe vā kumārge vā na patati /
T04sanssr_pu:2805: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dadātīyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2811: yathā yathā cāsyaḥ [doubtful] kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathaiva prajānāti // pe//
T04sanssr_pu:2812: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2814: aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavatīti
T04sanssr_pu:2819: ato 'vagamyate ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogās te śīlāntargatā iti /
T04sanssr_pu:2821: tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ tatraiva sūtre vacanāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2826: etābhyāṃ ca śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhanakarābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ etāvatī ceyaṃ bodhisatvaśikṣā yad uta cittaparikarma /
T04sanssr_pu:2831: api tu cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:2832: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham //
T04sanssr_pu:2837: sa evaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sūpasthitasmṛtir viharati na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:2838: ap tu cittam evāsya vaśaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:2842: yo 'yaṃ dharmo dharma ity ucyate nāyaṃ dharmo deśastho na pradeśastho 'nyatra svacittādhīno
T04sanssr_pu:2843: dharmaḥ tasmān mayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitaṃ susamārabdhaṃ sunigṛhītaṃ kartavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2847: tatra bodhisatvo doṣebhyaś cittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati //
T04sanssr_pu:2848: tad ucyate / cittādhīno dharmo dharmādhīnā bodhir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2849: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādānaḥ sukhābhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartatae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2857: tathātraiva māyādevyadarśanākulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanārtham iyam anuśāsanī /
T04sanssr_pu:2865: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā /
T04sanssr_pu:2867: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlasamārjanam anuprāptuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2869: tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasyaivaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhaysa sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante /
T04sanssr_pu:2874: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt //
T04sanssr_pu:2875: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2876: yadā tu smṛtisaṃprajanyena bāhyāś ceṣṭā nivartitā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati /
T04sanssr_pu:2878: adyatve 'pi ca satvārthakṣamo bhavaty eva prasādakaratvāt / kathaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2880: āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś cāpi jāyate //
T04sanssr_pu:2881: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvāvarjanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2884: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenaiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2886: na bhagavan bodhisatvasyānyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvāvarjanāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2887: satvaparipāka eveyaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasya dharmasaṃgītir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2888: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣa ity āha /
T04sanssr_pu:2889: annādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2892: yena cāsya paribhava evam annartho ratnameghe jinenoktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2893: yenāprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2895: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nāsthāne viharati nākāle /
T04sanssr_pu:2896: nākālabhāṇī bhavati nākālajño bhavati nādeśajño bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:2897: yato nidānam asyāntike satvā aprasādaṃ prativedayeyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2899: ātmanaś ca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ saṃpanneryāpatho bhavati mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī /
T04sanssr_pu:2904: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatīti /
T04sanssr_pu:2905: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha raho'vasthādiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2906: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyādīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi cotsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣārthaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2907: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca raha utsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvānnutsiṣṭāhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:2909: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavya iti /
T04sanssr_pu:2910: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva /
T04sanssr_pu:2911: atra tu sūtre brahmacāryadhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarāpattibhayasaṃdarśanārthaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:2915: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:2916: tathā prātimokṣād api lokāprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2919: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam //
T04sanssr_pu:2920: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokāprasādaṃ rakṣeta /
T04sanssr_pu:2921: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanārtham upadarśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2936: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā /
T04sanssr_pu:2944: yeyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasantānaparasantānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya /
T04sanssr_pu:2945: yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manāpakaraṇī [doubtful] hitakaraṇī
T04sanssr_pu:2946: karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā aniśritā bahujanakāntā
T04sanssr_pu:2950: yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:2956: na bodhisatvenaiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparo vyāpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:2957: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparaṃ tāpayet /
T04sanssr_pu:2958: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt /
T04sanssr_pu:2959: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayārthā nirarthā /
T04sanssr_pu:2960: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyām utpādayet /
T04sanssr_pu:2961: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yā satvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā na sā vāg bhāṣitavyeti //
T04sanssr_pu:2963: apara eka dharmo mahāyānasaṃgrahāya saṃvartate svaskhalitapratyavekṣaṇatayā sarvasatvānurakṣeti //
T04sanssr_pu:2967: asya tu granthavistarasyāyaṃ piṇḍārtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:2971: nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:2978: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:2979: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte /
T04sanssr_pu:2988: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:2990: tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2994: evaṃ manāpāmanāpeṣu [doubtful] śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu vijñapteṣu nānunetavyaṃ na pratihantavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2996: dāntājāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram annutsṛjatā nāmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sāvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:2997: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrānunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto notpādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:2998: daśakulapraveśe na caikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:2999: tathāpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam /
T04sanssr_pu:3000: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3001: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3002: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3004: ye cāsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3006: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣā ābhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3008: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3011: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3012: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:3014: santy annābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nāgacchanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3015: teṣām itaḥ piṇḍapātād agraṃ pratyaṃśaṃ niryātayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3017: tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyāyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa
T04sanssr_pu:3024: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3025: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3026: lūhāhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣama uccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:3030: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrāpi mātrābhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca /
T04sanssr_pu:3031: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3032: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgā āmiṣabhojanenārthikās te dattādānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3033: punar āha / tena sarveṇa rasasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3042: puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dadti na strīḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3043: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3044: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā /
T04sanssr_pu:3045: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3048: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3051: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3052: ime te sarve 'kuśalā manasikārā notpādayitavyaḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3053: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣūpapadyante /
T04sanssr_pu:3054: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭā agṛddhā alulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvendriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenāpi bhojanena jñāpayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3058: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam /
T04sanssr_pu:3060: kāyasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mārgasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mayā bhojanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3061: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghākulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyāvatartuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3062: tena maitryāhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnena evaṃ saṃjñotpādayitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:3063: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante /
T04sanssr_pu:3064: tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā notpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3066: na punar āryamārgabhāvanāyāṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayiṣyāmi // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3067: yatra kule piṇḍapātaṃ śuciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:3068: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyāsanāt prakramitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3069: piṇḍacārikeṇa kāśyapa bhikṣuṇā nāvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā //
T04sanssr_pu:3072: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapāta āsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3077: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3079: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenāśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena /
T04sanssr_pu:3080: kāyajāpanārtham āryamārgasyopastambhārthaṃ sa piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3082: yasyāś cāntike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3086: māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmāno bodhisatvasyeti vadāmi // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3089: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca /
T04sanssr_pu:3090: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet //
T04sanssr_pu:3091: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet /
T04sanssr_pu:3092: chidrāchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3093: lābhārthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3096: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3098: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakaṝiṇaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3101: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet //
T04sanssr_pu:3102: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3105: durgandhaḥ kutsanīyaś ca utmattaś cāpi jāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3111: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3112: khādate yadi nirlajja unmatto jāyate sadā //
T04sanssr_pu:3113: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante atha vā yogināṃ kule /
T04sanssr_pu:3122: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
T04sanssr_pu:3125: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3127: yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahārthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam //
T04sanssr_pu:3134: tena asmin na maitrī śaṅkāpi nāstīty adoṣaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3138: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇāntarāya iti /
T04sanssr_pu:3142: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena /
T04sanssr_pu:3144: tatra uddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3147: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmārthaṃ brahmacaryavāsārthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya /
T04sanssr_pu:3149: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cedṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhotsavasampad /
T04sanssr_pu:3150: iti tatpradarśanārthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyopayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3152: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyopastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3153: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā /
T04sanssr_pu:3154: na cānyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3155: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā glāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3156: yathārūpeṇāsya glānyena jīvitāntarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣāntarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānīti
T04sanssr_pu:3158: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ... [doubtful] pracchādanārthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanārtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣāsurasya lokasya caityam iti
T04sanssr_pu:3166: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārānukūlānīti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā naikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāma iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3168: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryā asaṃyatā itaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3171: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā ādīptaśīrṣā ādīptapātrā ādīptāsanā ādīptaśayanāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3172: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarva ādīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūtaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3173: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3175: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3177: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasya eva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3178: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nādhyavasānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3180: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nāsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3182: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3183: pādasyopari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3186: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai /
T04sanssr_pu:3187: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvārtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3196: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogācārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /
T04sanssr_pu:3199: na punar aprāptaphalā ekapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3201: sādhu sādhu kulaputrā evaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokāvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate //
T04sanssr_pu:3206: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogācāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
T04sanssr_pu:3207: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv annātmādhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇābhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
T04sanssr_pu:3209: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ puṇyavipāko bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3212: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yeyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3213: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3214: cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3215: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣaya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3216: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanārambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakānugrahe /
T04sanssr_pu:3221: tatrāpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājoktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayārtham uccārayet /
T04sanssr_pu:3229: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokottaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3242: anenādikarmikā api satveṣv anantaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3243: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ mārādibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:3244: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti //
T04sanssr_pu:3246: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet //
T04sanssr_pu:3248: buddhabodhisatvālambanena sarvasatvārthābhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3255: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyāpi sidhyati /
T04sanssr_pu:3258: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:3259: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3260: bodhicittadṛḍhatā cātra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamārtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
T04sanssr_pu:3265: tathā kuto mamālpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3266: na cātikrāntadurgater utsāhormibahulasyopacitāprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyāyaṃ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3267: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nādhikākṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
T04sanssr_pu:3270: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihaiva yatheṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati //
T04sanssr_pu:3282: namo 'stu te agrograśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā //
T04sanssr_pu:3285: bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā rakṣeta /
T04sanssr_pu:3294: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭābhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
T04sanssr_pu:3316: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3318: yaś cainaṃ ahir daśati saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrddhā arjakasyeva mañjarī //
T04sanssr_pu:3319: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3321: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate //
T04sanssr_pu:3349: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3377: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopāye sopasargebhyaḥ svāhā //
T04sanssr_pu:3389: imām api vidyām annantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakopanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣārthaṃ prayuñjīta //
T04sanssr_pu:3402: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā //
T04sanssr_pu:3407: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭāpattim āpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3408: atha vitṛṣṇo 'nyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3411: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmika evātmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣata ity adoṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3412: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta //
T04sanssr_pu:3415: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam annanujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaścid doṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3416: nāpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyāntike kasyacid viditavṛttāntasyāpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittāparijñānāt //
T04sanssr_pu:3417: na cātra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3418: sarvotsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhoktyā pratipāditaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3420: tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti //
T04sanssr_pu:3423: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:3425: tatra sukṛtārambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvata iti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā //
T04sanssr_pu:3433: alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti //
T04sanssr_pu:3437: adhikasatvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3439: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3443: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
T04sanssr_pu:3444: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3445: na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānam anujñātaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3446: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3448: sacet punaḥ kaścid evāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
T04sanssr_pu:3451: sacet punas tasyonaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmacaryavāsaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3455: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenālpecchatā āsevitā bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:3456: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3458: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād /
T04sanssr_pu:3463: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādya iti kuto gamyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3478: tathā ca dharmasaṅgītau sārthavāho bodhisatva āha /
T04sanssr_pu:3479: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nātmanaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3482: kiṃ tu satvārthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nāropayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3483: yatra tu satvārthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti ko viśeṣo /
T04sanssr_pu:3484: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati /
T04sanssr_pu:3487: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nāstīty upekṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:3490: catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisatvapratirūpakā ity ārabhyoktaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3492: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathāryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā /
T04sanssr_pu:3499: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3503: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3506: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nātmana iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3511: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahārthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3512: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt //
T04sanssr_pu:3514: ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3515: yaś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmakamaḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittam utpādayet /
T04sanssr_pu:3517: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaitīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3529: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3534: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3537: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:3538: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanābhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3541: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaḥkṛto bhavati devaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3544: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadāpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgendrāsurendraiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3548: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyānukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3551: yad utākṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt /
T04sanssr_pu:3555: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā /
T04sanssr_pu:3556: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra parārthāt /
T04sanssr_pu:3560: dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3562: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyāpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3567: pāpasya daurmanasyenaiva puṇyasya saumanasyenāpattiḥ satvārthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3568: yathā ratnameghe vaidyadṛṣṭāntena ātmotkarṣo nirdoṣa uktaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3569: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā /
T04sanssr_pu:3570: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet //
T04sanssr_pu:3572: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante /
T04sanssr_pu:3573: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3580: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam /
T04sanssr_pu:3582: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntādharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3583: atrāntare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni /
T04sanssr_pu:3584: yāvad athāyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:3585: yad uktaṃ bhagavatāsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
T04sanssr_pu:3586: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3587: nāham upāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3589: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3590: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3593: pratighaḥ pratigha iti kalpaśatopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenocyate pratigha iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3594: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyābhihitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3596: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smeti /
T04sanssr_pu:3597: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadety ucyate //
T04sanssr_pu:3600: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
T04sanssr_pu:3605: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3606: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
T04sanssr_pu:3610: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:3615: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nonnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3617: na cireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:3618: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv annāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā /
T04sanssr_pu:3619: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sūpasthitasmṛtir viharatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3620: punar āha / caṇḍālakumāropamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā /
T04sanssr_pu:3621: mānamadadarpādhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3623: iha kulaputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānām iti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3624: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3625: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3626: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3628: parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3630: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3632: yad uta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3634: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3640: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyeti //
T04sanssr_pu:3642: syād yathāpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
T04sanssr_pu:3643: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3644: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotendriyasyābhāsam āgacchanti
T04sanssr_pu:3646: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārāṅkuśāviddho vatāyaṃ bodhisatva iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3651: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmādhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājapratilabdhānāṃ nāvanamati /
T04sanssr_pu:3655: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma //
T04sanssr_pu:3660: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānann abudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3662: na ca parasya guṇavarṇenāttamanā bhavati / mārakarma //
T04sanssr_pu:3663: jānāti ca / ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:3670: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati / mārakarma //
T04sanssr_pu:3682: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3692: sa evaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet /
T04sanssr_pu:3693: atha ca punar bodhicittabalādhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:3698: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante /
T04sanssr_pu:3710: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3713: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:3717: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ ādita eva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3720: hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3724: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvābhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate //
T04sanssr_pu:3730: lokaprasādānurakṣārthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vākṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3731: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt /
T04sanssr_pu:3733: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenāttamanaskataro
T04sanssr_pu:3737: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanāvitṛptatayā /
T04sanssr_pu:3738: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3739: cittatuṣṭisukham avakrāntaṃ mahāṃś cittodagratāvegaḥ prādurbhūto yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:3740: ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā
T04sanssr_pu:3742: evam anyagatabhāve satvānām agratogamanopasthānādiprasaṅge sarvotsargaṃ smaret /
T04sanssr_pu:3746: athavā svāmyaprasādabhīteneva tatprasādārthineva tadājñāsaṃpādanā manasi kartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:3751: mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:3753: āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3754: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:3755: mā bhagavān etasya glānasyāśucimraks.itāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu /
T04sanssr_pu:3758: tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova /
T04sanssr_pu:3760: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati /
T04sanssr_pu:3762: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet /
T04sanssr_pu:3765: yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti /
T04sanssr_pu:3766: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:3767: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3769: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3770: guruvac ca devateva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te //
T04sanssr_pu:3772: satvārādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet //
T04sanssr_pu:3773: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathepsitam /
T04sanssr_pu:3775: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt //
T04sanssr_pu:3776: mahāpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam evācaraṇīyam eṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:3777: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3778: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
T04sanssr_pu:3779: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04sanssr_pu:3783: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām //
T04sanssr_pu:3786: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām //
T04sanssr_pu:3787: ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyam upaimi loke /
T04sanssr_pu:3788: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3789: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpātmabhir naiva hi saṃśayo 'tra /
T04sanssr_pu:3792: tathāgatārādhanam etad eva svārthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva /
T04sanssr_pu:3793: lokasya duṣkhāpaham etad eva tasmān mamāstu vratam etad eva //
T04sanssr_pu:3796: yasmān naiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3797: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet //
T04sanssr_pu:3798: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3799: tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā //
T04sanssr_pu:3800: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā /
T04sanssr_pu:3802: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:3805: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi //
T04sanssr_pu:3808: maitrāśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat /
T04sanssr_pu:3809: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat //
T04sanssr_pu:3810: ata eva hi candrapradīpasūtre maitrībhāvaphalam udbhāvitam /
T04sanssr_pu:3820: iha bodhisatva ekākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito naivaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3824: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3828: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3832: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmābhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet //
T04sanssr_pu:3834: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā //
T04sanssr_pu:3836: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyāntarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
T04sanssr_pu:3837: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindor nāntarāsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3847: yāni ca tāni mahānagareṣu mahāśmaśānāni bhavanty annekaprāṇiśatasahasrākīrṇāni /
T04sanssr_pu:3848: tatrāpi sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāntam ātmabhāvaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagatam upadarśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3849: tatra te tiryagyonigatāḥ satvā yāvad arthaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhujyāyuḥparyante mṛtāḥ kālagatāḥ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
T04sanssr_pu:3850: sa caiva teṣāṃ hetur bhavati yāvat parinirvāṇāya /
T04sanssr_pu:3854: ye me mṛtasya kālagatasya māṃsaṃ paribhuñjīran /
T04sanssr_pu:3855: sa eva teṣāṃ hetur bhavet svargotpattaye yāvat parinirvāṇāya tasya śīlavataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3860: sa dharmakāyaprabhāvito darśanenāpi satvānām arthaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:3862: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate jīvakena vaidyarājena sarvabhaiṣajyāni samudānīya bhaiṣajyatarusaṃhātam
T04sanssr_pu:3863: ayaṃ dārikārūpaṃ kṛtaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sukṛtaṃ suniṣṭhitaṃ suparikarmakṛtaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3864: sāgacchati gacchati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3865: tatra ye āgacchanty āturā mahātmāno rājāno vā rājamātrā vā śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājāno vā /
T04sanssr_pu:3866: tān sa jīvako vaidyarājas tayā bhaiṣajyadārikayā sārddhaṃ saṃyojayati /
T04sanssr_pu:3867: teṣāṃ samanantarasaṃyogam āpannānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ prasrabhyante 'rāgāś ca bhavanti sukhino nirvikārāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3868: paśya śāntamate jīvakasya vaidyarājasya laukikavyādhicikitsājñānaṃ yady anyeṣāṃ vaidyānāṃ saṃvidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3869: evam eva śāntamate tasya dharmakāyaprabhāvitasya bodhisatvasya yāvantaḥ satvāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā rāgadoṣamohasaṃtaptāḥ kāyaṃ spṛśanti /
T04sanssr_pu:3870: teṣāṃ saṃspṛṣṭamātrāṇāṃ sarvakleśāḥ prasrabhyante vigatasaṃtāpaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjānanti //
T04sanssr_pu:3874: tṛṇachannaṃ yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate /
T04sanssr_pu:3875: buddhāṅkuras tathā vṛddhiṃ kleśachanno na gacchati //
T04sanssr_pu:3882: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:3888: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karmādhyacārati tatra tatraiva ca vipratisārabahulī bhavati //
T04sanssr_pu:3889: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3893: ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:3897: ye ca daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dvipadottamāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3898: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3901: kuśalaṃ cāprajānatā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3903: tāruṇyamadamattena yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3905: annādīnavadarśinā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3909: atṛptadhanadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3911: śāṭhyadāridryadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3913: annaiśvaryagatenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3915: kṣutpipāsārditenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3916: pānārthaṃ bhojanārthaṃ ca vastrārthaṃ strīṣu hetunā /
T04sanssr_pu:3917: vicitraiḥ kleśasaṃtāpair yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:3919: yat kṛtam īdṛśai rūpais tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3920: yat tu buddheṣu dharmeṣu śrāvakeṣu tathaiva ca /
T04sanssr_pu:3921: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3922: yat tu pratyekabuddheṣu bodhisatveṣu vā punaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3923: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat srvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3925: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3926: saddharmaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ syād ajñānaṃ tena me sadā /
T04sanssr_pu:3927: mātāpitṛṣv agauravaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3929: rāgadveṣeṇa mohena tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3932: yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā kalpaśateṣu ca /
T04sanssr_pu:3935: yatra yatra cariṣyāmi na cāsti me balaṃ kvacit //
T04sanssr_pu:3936: sarve kāruṇikā buddhāḥ sarve bhayaharā jage /
T04sanssr_pu:3937: atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu mocayantu ca māṃ bhayāt //
T04sanssr_pu:3940: sarvaṃ pāpaṃ deśayāmi yat tu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā /
T04sanssr_pu:3941: yac ca etarhi me pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3943: na chādayāmi tat pāpaṃ yad bhaven mama duṣkṛtam //
T04sanssr_pu:3944: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham /
T04sanssr_pu:3945: manasā triprakāreṇa tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3947: kṛtaṃ daśavidhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
T04sanssr_pu:3948: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma anniṣṭaphaladāyakaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3949: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi buddhānāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3950: bhavagatisaṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yan me kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam /
T04sanssr_pu:3951: daśabalam agrataḥ sthitaḥ tat sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3952: deśayāmi ca tat pāpaṃ yan mayā saṃcitaṃ janmasaṃkaṭe vividhaiḥ kāyapracārasaṃkaṭair bhavasaṃkaṭalokasaṃkaṭe cāpalacalacittasaṃkaṭe mūrkhabālakṛtakleśasaṃkaṭe
T04sanssr_pu:3954: bhayasaṃkaṭarāgasaṃkaṭe doṣamohatamasaṃkaṭair api kṣaṇasaṃkaṭe kālasaṃkaṭe puṇyopārjanasaṃkaṭair api /
T04sanssr_pu:3957: viśeṣatas tu bodhisatvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ deśanāryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktā /
T04sanssr_pu:3960: saced upāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gaṅgānadīvālikopamā rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattīr āpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:3961: yāṃ caikato dveṣasaṃprayuktām āpattim āpadyeta bodhisatvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3962: iyaṃ tābhyo gurutarā āpattir yeyaṃ dveṣasaṃyuktā /
T04sanssr_pu:3967: na tatra bodhisatvasya chalaṃ na bhayaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:3968: tasmāt tarhi tvām upāle yāḥ kāścana rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattayaḥ sarvas tā annāpattaya iti vadāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:3973: tatropāle ye 'nnupāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati /
T04sanssr_pu:3974: ye punar upāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3979: kevalayā ca kṛpayā kleśabalād acireṇa kṛpāhāniḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:3981: tad yathā kulaputra maṃtravidyādharaḥ puruṣo rājñā pañcapāśakena bandhanena baddhaḥ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:3982: sa yadā kāṅkṣeta prakramaṇāya tadaikamantravidyābalena sarvabandhanāni chittvā prakramet /
T04sanssr_pu:3983: evam eva kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati taiś cākīrṇo viharati /
T04sanssr_pu:3984: yadā ca punar ākāṅkṣate tadā prajñābalādhīnena ekena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmalokae upapadyatae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:3988: parārthasiddhiṃ vā svārthād gurutarām adhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayāpi param anuśāsyānutāpapūrvakam āyatyāṃ saṃvaram utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:3992: yady api tasya satvasya taddhitaṃ tathāpi bodhisatvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ satvārthānubandhasya hāniḥ syāt //
T04sanssr_pu:3993: āryasatyake parivartte 'pi putradṛṣṭāntaḥ karuṇādhiṣṭhita eva veditavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:3994: yaś ca tatrāpi kṛpāpratiṣedhaḥ sa lokārthapāṇḍityena lokāvarjanārthaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:3995: nivāryamāṇaś ca yadi hitakāme bodhisatve pratighaṃ labheta sa bodhisatvaḥ syād ubhayor annarthaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4007: tad yathāpi nāmānanda kaścid eva puruṣo 'dhastāt pādatalam ādāya yāvan murddhany ādīpto bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:4008: saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhutas taṃ kaścid eva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vaded /
T04sanssr_pu:4009: ehi tvāṃ bhoḥ puruṣa nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
T04sanssr_pu:4011: api tu sa puruṣo 'nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍeta ramet paricaret //
T04sanssr_pu:4015: krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo ramet paricaret parikalpam upādāyāparinirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūto /
T04sanssr_pu:4016: na tv evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisatvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya satvān tribhir apāyair duṣkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrān abhūt saumanasyaṃ vā cittaprasādo veti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4018: paśyator mātāpitror na svasaukhyasaṃgo dṛṣṭaḥ svānurūpakṛpāvaśāt /
T04sanssr_pu:4019: pracchannas tarhi sasvāmikāsu nisvāmikāsu bāhuladharmadhvajarakṣitāsu kāmamithyācāro na syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:4023: evaṃ tarhi bhikṣor apy evam āpannaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4029: upāyakauśalyasūtre jyotirmāṇavakaṃ dvācatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrabrahmacāriṇam adhikṛtya saptame pade sthitasya kāruṇyam utpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:4030: kiṃ cāpy aham idaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4031: tathāpy utsahe 'haṃ nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ prativedayitum atha ceyaṃ strī sukhitā bhavatu /
T04sanssr_pu:4033: iti hi kulaputra jyotirmāṇavakaḥ paścānmukho nivartya tāṃ striyaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvaivam āha /
T04sanssr_pu:4034: uttiṣṭha bhagini yathākāmakaraṇīyas te bhavāmīti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4035: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākāruṇyacittotpādenetvareṇa kāmopasaṃhitena daśakalpasahasrāṇi paścānmukham akārṣam /
T04sanssr_pu:4036: paśya kulaputra yad anyeṣāṃ nirayasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma /
T04sanssr_pu:4039: yadi bodhisatva ekasya satvasya kuśalamūlaṃ saṃjanayet tathārūpāṃ cāpattim āpadyeta yathārūpayāpattyāpannayā kalpaśatasahasraṃ niraye pacyeta
T04sanssr_pu:4040: utsoḍhavyam eva bhagavan bodhisatvenāpattim āpattuṃ tac ca nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4041: na tv eva tasyaikasay satvasya kuśalaṃ parityaktum iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4043: iha kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvo yadā kadācit kasmiṃścit pāpamitravaśenāpattim āpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:4049: yathā yathā saṃsariṣyāmi tathā tathā satvān paripācayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4050: api tv etāṃ cāpattiṃ yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4052: sacet kulaputra pravrajito bodhisatvaḥ parikalpam ādāya sarvāś catasro mūlāpattīr atikramed anena copāyakauśalyena vinodayed /
T04sanssr_pu:4055: śrāvakavinaye 'pi mūlāpattisthānae eva kāruṇyān mṛgādimokṣaṇe 'nnāpattir uktaiva //
T04sanssr_pu:4056: ayaṃ ca rāge guṇo yad bodhisatve rāgam utpādya sugatir labhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4059: priyaṃkare bodhisatve raktā ... dhavyottarāṃ dārikām adhikṛtya /
T04sanssr_pu:4060: priyaṃkarasya praṇidheḥ punaḥ punar yā istri prekṣeta sarāgacittā /
T04sanssr_pu:4061: sā istribhāvaṃ parivarjayitvā puruṣo bhavet yādṛg udārasatvaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4064: tenaiva śūreṣu janitva rāgaṃ gacchanti svargaṃ puruṣatvam eva ca // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4068: kiṃ vā punar yaḥ tān satkareyā / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4069: evam anyasmin satvārthopāye sati rāgajāpattir annāpattir uktā //
T04sanssr_pu:4070: upāyakauśalyasūtre ca gaṇikāvat kṛtārtho bodhisatvo nirapekṣas taṃ satvaṃ tyajatīti vistareṇoktam //
T04sanssr_pu:4071: alabdhabhūmeś ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu caritavata iyaṃ cintā /
T04sanssr_pu:4078: tatra śāriputra prathamā āpattir daśavarge ṛjukena deśayitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:4081: duṣṭacittāpattir ekapudgalasya dvayor vā śāriputra tāṃ gurvīṃ daśayet /
T04sanssr_pu:4083: stūpāpattiḥ saṃghāpattis tathānyāś cāpattayo bodhisatvena na pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4084: bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivaṃ ekākinā gurvyo deśayitavyāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4124: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4125: te māṃ samanvāharantu buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre
T04sanssr_pu:4126: jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā [doubtful] pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:4127: staupikaṃ vā sāṅghikaṃ vā dravyam apahṛtaṃ syāt hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:4128: pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vānumoditāni bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4129: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartitaṃ syāt pare vā samādāpitāḥ syur vartamānā
T04sanssr_pu:4130: vānumoditā bhaveyur yena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto 'haṃ nirayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4131: vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:4132: deveṣūpapadyeyam indriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vopagṛhṇīyāṃ buddhotpādaṃ vā virāgayeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4133: tat sarvaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ cakṣurbhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4134: pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatām agrataḥ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmy
T04sanssr_pu:4136: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātāv anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre
T04sanssr_pu:4137: vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhaved antaśas tiryagyonigatāyāpy ālopaḥ śīlaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4138: vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yac ca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me satvaparipākakuśalamūlaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4139: yac ca me bodhicittakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me 'nnuttarajñānakuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam aikadhyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4140: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvābhisaṃkṣipyānnutt arāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā pariṇāmanayā
T04sanssr_pu:4141: yathā pariṇāmitam atītair buddhair bhagavadbhir yathā pariṇāmayiṣyanty annāgatā buddhā
T04sanssr_pu:4142: bhagavanto yathā pariṇamanty etarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4147: ye cābhyatītās tathāpi ca ye annāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4148: annantavarṇān guṇasāgaropamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4149: ye bodhisatvāḥ karuṇabalair upetā vicarati loke satvahitāya śūrāḥ trāyantu te māṃ sadapāpakāriṇaṃ [doubtful] /
T04sanssr_pu:4151: iti hi śāriputra bodhisatvenemān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaśuddhiḥ kāryā /
T04sanssr_pu:4152: tasyaivaṃ sarvapāpaviśuddhasya tatra ca buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti satvavimokṣārtham eva /
T04sanssr_pu:4154: na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad
T04sanssr_pu:4155: bodhisatvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4161: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān udgrahīṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4164: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni /
T04sanssr_pu:4165: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭae eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantīti //
T04sanssr_pu:4167: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇātipātānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4168: idam agram adattādānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyāpaharaṇatā /
T04sanssr_pu:4169: idam agraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca /
T04sanssr_pu:4170: idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyābhyākhyānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4172: idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utāryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4173: idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4175: idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā /
T04sanssr_pu:4176: idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4178: sacet kāśyapa ekasatva ebhir evaṃ mahāsāvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:4179: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren /
T04sanssr_pu:4180: nātra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti
T04sanssr_pu:4181: hy akṛtām annabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4182: sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4185: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatva āpattim annāpattiṃ paśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:4191: akṣiṇī nimīlya buddhabodhisatvālambanacittaḥ śatākṣaram aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
T04sanssr_pu:4192: nimīlitākṣa eva buddhabodhisatvān paśyati vigatapāpo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4193: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ caikatamaṃ puraḥkṛtyāyam eva vidhir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4194: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
T04sanssr_pu:4195: tad yathā krandanādichardanadadhikṣīrādibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4200: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhāvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4201: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:4202: yo 'pi daśākuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyāpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya
T04sanssr_pu:4205: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
T04sanssr_pu:4206: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhīta ekapuṣpam āropayet
T04sanssr_pu:4207: tathāgatapūjāyai janāñjaliṃ copanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4208: cāpanayed upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4210: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavata itimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā
T04sanssr_pu:4211: vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen
T04sanssr_pu:4216: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4217: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4219: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4220: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4222: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
T04sanssr_pu:4225: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4226: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare //
T04sanssr_pu:4228: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:4231: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4233: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
T04sanssr_pu:4234: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
T04sanssr_pu:4236: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4242: asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
T04sanssr_pu:4244: yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
T04sanssr_pu:4246: abhūmiś cātra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4248: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4249: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4251: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4252: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4253: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyāgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4256: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4258: te tataś cyutā iha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4260: annekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4267: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
