T04sanssr_pu:4269: sa tasya paścimo mātṛgrāmabhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4273: ya eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ tu dhārayet /
T04sanssr_pu:4278: prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4280: yat pūrvāntakoṭipañcagaticakrāruḍhena saṃsāranadyudyātena prāṇātipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dharmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vānumoditaṃ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:4281: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇātipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvānarthaṃ mardayati /
T04sanssr_pu:4283: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghāyuṣka iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4284: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattādānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrāsayatnenāsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
T04sanssr_pu:4285: adhārmikabhogānabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattādānahetukaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4286: evaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣākuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
T04sanssr_pu:4291: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam /
T04sanssr_pu:4296: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4297: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te //
T04sanssr_pu:4298: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4302: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4304: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4306: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:4307: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
T04sanssr_pu:4308: tad yathā kulaputraikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
T04sanssr_pu:4310: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvāśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārānugate
T04sanssr_pu:4311: praveśyate sa saha praveśito 'nnabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśāvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
T04sanssr_pu:4313: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4314: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāsti durgatyapāyaparopakramabhayam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4316: ihopāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvāhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:4317: madhyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito vihared aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4318: sacen madhyāhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito bhaved aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4320: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4321: tatra bodhisatvena nātikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4322: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:4323: naṣṭaḥ śrāvakasya pudgalasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4327: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥślyotpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmāvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta //
T04sanssr_pu:4335: tatrāpi vikṣepapraśamanānabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
T04sanssr_pu:4337: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
T04sanssr_pu:4352: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:4354: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenānunayapratighāpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmānanuliptena /
T04sanssr_pu:4355: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nonnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4357: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cānena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4363: api ca / yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
T04sanssr_pu:4366: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4373: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
T04sanssr_pu:4376: na cābhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
T04sanssr_pu:4377: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahārakakaivartakarṣakādīnāṃ duṣkhābhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇāṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4379: tathā prākṛtā api kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenaiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanā api saṃgrāmayanty eva /
T04sanssr_pu:4380: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālāpakāriṣu duṣkhopāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nāvadhyaghātakeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:4382: annavadhikalpābaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:4387: tathā sarvaduṣkhotpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānābhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
T04sanssr_pu:4388: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate //
T04sanssr_pu:4391: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
T04sanssr_pu:4393: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4394: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4395: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyārddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate bandhanāgāreṣv api praks.iptasya // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4398: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4399: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4400: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:4401: akṣiṇyutpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vāghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:4405: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ carata etat praṇidhānam abhūt /
T04sanssr_pu:4408: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4409: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇāchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4411: sa ebhir manaḥkāraiḥ samanvāgata etena karmaṇā /
T04sanssr_pu:4412: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvānugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
T04sanssr_pu:4413: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:4414: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhākrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye akṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4421: saumyāya dṛṣṭīya sadā sthito bhaved / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4426: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4464: iti hi yā sarvendriyeṣv annavalīnendriyatā iyam ucyate muditety ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:4465: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
T04sanssr_pu:4466: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4467: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayāgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantīti //
T04sanssr_pu:4471: annāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārādhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
T04sanssr_pu:4479: sa evam adhyāśayasaṃpanna eva samānaḥ sarvasatvānām antikād uccaghanāṃ sahate /
T04sanssr_pu:4480: unmananāṃ kutsanāṃ sahate sarvasatvānām ākrośaparibhāṣāṃ duruktadurāgatān vacanapathān sahate /
T04sanssr_pu:4482: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4497: ... sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4498: yatraiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam
T04sanssr_pu:4499: utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ votpādayiṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:4500: tatrāsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
T04sanssr_pu:4501: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4502: paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitā annarthakarmāṇaḥ śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4503: mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4504: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyāntike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4506: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyāpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyāpi tiryagyonigatasyāpi
T04sanssr_pu:4507: yamalokagatasyāpi manuṣyagatasyāpi kāmāhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamājīvagocarasya
T04sanssr_pu:4508: nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4509: kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmārthaṃ kṛto na parārthaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4510: sacet punar punar mamaite sarvasatvā aparāntakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathāpi mayāparityaktaiva sarvajñatā /
T04sanssr_pu:4515: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
T04sanssr_pu:4517: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvārambaṇā mahākaruṇā // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4523: evaṃ dharmagaṇanāviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4526: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
T04sanssr_pu:4529: yat kāye chidyamāne ya evāsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣārthaṃ kṣamate /
T04sanssr_pu:4530: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ copadarśayatīyam asya kṣāntipāramitā //
T04sanssr_pu:4531: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ notsṛjati cittabalādhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
T04sanssr_pu:4535: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittotpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evāpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:4537: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsopamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyāvatarati /
T04sanssr_pu:4538: bhūtānityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtānātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyopanidhyāyati /
T04sanssr_pu:4545: eṣa eva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4547: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām annupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4550: sa parigaveṣamāṇo na taṃ dharmam upalabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:4557: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4558: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
T04sanssr_pu:4562: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4563: pareṣām antike na mamaitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
T04sanssr_pu:4564: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣāntaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
T04sanssr_pu:4566: na mayāśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmāhaṃ vyāpadye /
T04sanssr_pu:4567: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4571: na mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4574: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:4582: kiyadbahū dharmaparyāyuṇeyā [doubtful] śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrute namanta /
T04sanssr_pu:4583: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim //
T04sanssr_pu:4585: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñāgamo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4588: atra ca maharṣer uttarasya jātakaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvāha /
T04sanssr_pu:4591: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitā api buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cānuśrāvayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4596: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4597: parikṣīṇāyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś cāyurbalaṃ copasaṃharanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4598: buddhādhiṣṭhānena devatādhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4599: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vā ākāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4608: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyābhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4613: chandākāram āśayākāram adhyāśayākāraṃ prayogākāraṃ nirmāṇākāram apramāṇākāraṃ kalyāṇamitrākāraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4614: gauravākāraṃ pradakṣiṇākāraṃ suvacanākāraṃ paryupāsanākāram avahitaśrotrākāraṃ manaḥkārākāram
T04sanssr_pu:4616: smṛtibhajanākāraṃ gatibodhanākāraṃ matirocanākāraṃ buddhipraveśāk āram atṛptabuddhadharmaśravaṇākāraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4623: pratītyasamutpādākāraṃ anityākāraṃ duṣkhākāram annātmākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākāraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4632: yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sa evāsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4633: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yeyam alpārthatālpakṛtyatālpabhāṣatālpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutārthaparitulanatā
T04sanssr_pu:4669: lokāyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4670: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānīti //
T04sanssr_pu:4671: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4672: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyāpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4675: na teṣām asāmarthye 'pi prakṛtiduṣṭatvād gṛhāvāsasya ca prajñaptisāvadyatvād iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4679: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:4681: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4682: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam annuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
T04sanssr_pu:4683: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4684: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4685: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsīd annāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
T04sanssr_pu:4686: yehi sthitair eva agāramadhye prāptā iyaṃ uttama agrabodhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4687: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4688: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4689: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
T04sanssr_pu:4690: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān //
T04sanssr_pu:4691: yaś caiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvārtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4692: araṇyābhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
T04sanssr_pu:4693: yadi punar visabhāgasatvānunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhādikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
T04sanssr_pu:4695: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4696: mamāntike ceti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam //
T04sanssr_pu:4697: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
T04sanssr_pu:4698: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4699: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
T04sanssr_pu:4700: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:4701: sahadhārmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /
T04sanssr_pu:4702: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmā imam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti //
T04sanssr_pu:4703: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhya sārddham /
T04sanssr_pu:4704: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe //
T04sanssr_pu:4706: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyāpriya nāsti kahiṃcit /
T04sanssr_pu:4707: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:4710: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yatheva vrajanti //
T04sanssr_pu:4711: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
T04sanssr_pu:4712: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriya vidyati saṃgo //
T04sanssr_pu:4713: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
T04sanssr_pu:4714: anta ubhe api tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme //
T04sanssr_pu:4716: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
T04sanssr_pu:4717: na vivadati kadāci yuktayogī imi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
T04sanssr_pu:4718: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
T04sanssr_pu:4719: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4720: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sada upaśāntarato vivekacārī /
T04sanssr_pu:4721: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
T04sanssr_pu:4722: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
T04sanssr_pu:4723: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'sya imi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve //
T04sanssr_pu:4724: punar āha / vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
T04sanssr_pu:4725: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4728: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4729: na strīsaṃbhava naiva cāpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4731: lābhair nāpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
T04sanssr_pu:4734: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayaikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānīty ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:4735: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhādau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sa evaikaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4738: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatā udakārṇavenohyamāna udakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
T04sanssr_pu:4739: evam eva kāśyapa ihaike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4746: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe /
T04sanssr_pu:4747: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni
T04sanssr_pu:4748: ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
T04sanssr_pu:4751: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya
T04sanssr_pu:4752: svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena
T04sanssr_pu:4753: prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
T04sanssr_pu:4754: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4761: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4763: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntendriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:4766: sacet saṃvegānukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārodārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
T04sanssr_pu:4767: brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadānām apy upasaṃkrāmatāṃ yathānurūpāḥ kriyā upasaṃhartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:4768: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4769: te ca satvās tasyāntike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4771: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye prativasatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4774: bahavo 'py atrādāntā avinītā ayuktā annabhiyuktāḥ prativasanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4778: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyārthāyāraṇye prativasāmi sa mayārthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyārthaḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4779: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4792: anitye nitya iti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nnātmany ātmeti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto /
T04sanssr_pu:4798: śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto
T04sanssr_pu:4801: sarvebhyo 'kuśalebhyo manasikārebhyo bhayabhī ta ebhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo
T04sanssr_pu:4803: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4804: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhata utpadyante // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4805: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nātmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nātmābhiniveśaṃ nātmaparigrahaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4806: nātmanidānaṃ nātmatṛṣṇāṃ nātmasaṃjñāṃ nātmavādopādānaṃ nātmadṛṣṭiṃ nātmādhiṣṭhānaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4809: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nāsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
T04sanssr_pu:4811: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4812: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nottrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
T04sanssr_pu:4813: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā
T04sanssr_pu:4817: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4818: nāsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
T04sanssr_pu:4819: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa yad uta bhayaṃ nāma /
T04sanssr_pu:4821: tena yathāraṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4822: evam evāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyam eva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4825: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa iti jñātvāraṇye vastavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4827: upastabdhakuśalamūlaḥ paścādgrāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv avatīrya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4828: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatva uddeśasvādhyāyārthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
T04sanssr_pu:4829: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:4830: bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam annalasena svayaṃkāriṇāparopatāpinā na ca tenopasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4832: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4833: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
T04sanssr_pu:4835: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4836: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4838: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmānugraho naśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:4839: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4842: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko
T04sanssr_pu:4843: vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanam āgacchet tena sāyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya
T04sanssr_pu:4845: sacet punar asya parapratibaddha uddeśaḥ svādhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatāraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4846: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā cātṛpteti //
T04sanssr_pu:4848: yadi punar asya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4849: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4854: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4855: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
T04sanssr_pu:4857: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:4858: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayāmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4859: yadi punas tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'manuṣyā upasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
T04sanssr_pu:4861: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4862: tatra tenāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4863: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sa āraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4864: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyāśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4866: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadādhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4869: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4871: yathaiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:4874: evam evāyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsopamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyā utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4876: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti //
T04sanssr_pu:4878: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4879: yady apy aham araṇyam āgata eko 'dvitīyo /
T04sanssr_pu:4880: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
T04sanssr_pu:4881: api tu khalu punaḥ santīme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti /
T04sanssr_pu:4883: so 'ham ihāraṇyāyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:4884: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgata eko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4885: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vākuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:4887: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nnabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantīti //
T04sanssr_pu:4891: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate //
T04sanssr_pu:4893: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4896: laukikī dhyānopapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā /
T04sanssr_pu:4901: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:4902: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī /
T04sanssr_pu:4903: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato 'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4910: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4912: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya mana indriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4915: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi samāhitāvasthām asamāhitāvasthāṃ na vijahāti /
T04sanssr_pu:4920: rahasy arahasi vā kalpiteryāpathaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:4938: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān annabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4939: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayottejanaṃ kuryāt /
T04sanssr_pu:4942: bahu kalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣi /
T04sanssr_pu:4943: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4944: tathā / mayopamaṃ vitatham etat svapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4946: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:4947: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4949: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇāgnipradīptam anātham idam /
T04sanssr_pu:4950: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4951: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4952: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe //
T04sanssr_pu:4954: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī //
T04sanssr_pu:4956: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi //
T04sanssr_pu:4957: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokopadrava kāmaguṇāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4960: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4961: yatha agnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4963: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām /
T04sanssr_pu:4964: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathodakacandranibhā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā /
T04sanssr_pu:4966: kṣaṇikāvasikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikodakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4967: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
T04sanssr_pu:4968: jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm //
T04sanssr_pu:4969: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
T04sanssr_pu:4970: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm //
T04sanssr_pu:4971: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4972: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:4975: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:4976: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune //
T04sanssr_pu:4977: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam /
T04sanssr_pu:4978: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo //
T04sanssr_pu:4979: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī /
T04sanssr_pu:4980: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī //
T04sanssr_pu:4981: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalaneva mṛgāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4982: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī //
T04sanssr_pu:4983: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhi ojaharo /
T04sanssr_pu:4984: tatha ojaharo 'yu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam //
T04sanssr_pu:4986: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe //
T04sanssr_pu:4987: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā /
T04sanssr_pu:4988: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapattraphalā nadiśrotu yathā //
T04sanssr_pu:4989: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā /
T04sanssr_pu:4991: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān /
T04sanssr_pu:4992: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:4994: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:4995: sāravanto 'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4997: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum /
T04sanssr_pu:4998: evam eva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣadhair vā nivartanaṃ kartum /
T04sanssr_pu:5006: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:5007: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5008: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu
T04sanssr_pu:5012: e kākino 'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato
T04sanssr_pu:5013: mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya
T04sanssr_pu:5015: trāṇaṃ nānyac charaṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt /
T04sanssr_pu:5016: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5026: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyātrāṇasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt /
T04sanssr_pu:5027: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājānityatānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena /
T04sanssr_pu:5028: dharmeṇaiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nādharmeṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:5030: asyāpi te mahārājātmabhāvasyaivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya
T04sanssr_pu:5032: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrorṇākṣaumādibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanāvasthitasya vividhasvedāmbuklinnamalinavasanāvṛtasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5033: evam api te mahārāja snānānulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyātmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5034: evaṃ stryāgāramadhyagatasyāpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya

T04sanssr_pu:5337: ye cānyae evamādaya upakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5338: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
T04sanssr_pu:5339: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante /
T04sanssr_pu:5340: puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āniñjyopagāś cemae ucyante 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5341: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5342: apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5343: āniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5348: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ity ucyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5349: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5355: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5358: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
T04sanssr_pu:5360: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5361: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5362: tad idaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ucyate // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5370: atha cemāny asya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
T04sanssr_pu:5381: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyābhinirvṛttir na bhavati //
T04sanssr_pu:5388: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janita iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5389: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyandite 'vidyāvakīrṇe tatra tatrotpattyāyatanasandhau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati /
T04sanssr_pu:5391: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarādinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5392: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati
T04sanssr_pu:5393: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
T04sanssr_pu:5394: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5396: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:5403: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5418: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5420: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
T04sanssr_pu:5424: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrotpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5425: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
T04sanssr_pu:5426: tan nādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5431: yasmād anye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anyae aupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5432: na tu yae eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhās tae evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
T04sanssr_pu:5433: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:5436: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpy aniruddheṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:5437: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:5441: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
T04sanssr_pu:5443: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma kriyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5450: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputremaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:5451: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
T04sanssr_pu:5452: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham annāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
T04sanssr_pu:5454: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nnātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5456: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nābhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
T04sanssr_pu:5459: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvani /
T04sanssr_pu:5462: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5468: api tu khalu punar yad ucyate 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5473: eṣāparāntiky apekṣāta ūrddhvam asy pravṛttir iti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5479: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvāsya saṃyogasyāsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
T04sanssr_pu:5480: na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇām adhigamiṣyāmaḥ satvaparipācanatāyai / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:5488: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatva evaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5500: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
T04sanssr_pu:5505: na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5509: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti śarīram iti kuṇapa iti āyatanam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5513: anityo vatāyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
T04sanssr_pu:5518: so 'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5519: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:5520: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:5521: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:5523: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
T04sanssr_pu:5526: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nāśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:5527: so nāśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātīty ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5529: yad utāyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣira unnāmāvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [doubtful] /
T04sanssr_pu:5561: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5568: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathābhimānā //
T04sanssr_pu:5569: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
T04sanssr_pu:5570: sūdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatābhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
T04sanssr_pu:5572: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
T04sanssr_pu:5579: asvādhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūta iti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5581: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
T04sanssr_pu:5582: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:5584: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5587: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
T04sanssr_pu:5588: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgānuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
T04sanssr_pu:5589: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣānuśayaṃ prajahāti /
T04sanssr_pu:5590: yadāduṣkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:5594: duṣkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na pratihanyate pratighasamudghātaṃ cārjayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5597: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
T04sanssr_pu:5603: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
T04sanssr_pu:5604: yad aduṣkhāsukhaṃ tad annātmakam ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5606: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5607: api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanopādānaṃ vedanopalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanety ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5611: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5613: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
T04sanssr_pu:5618: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
T04sanssr_pu:5623: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5624: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5625: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5626: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5630: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5631: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam annavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5632: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5634: cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5635: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pāpamitrasadṛśaṃ sarvaduṣkhasaṃjananatayā / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5636: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
T04sanssr_pu:5643: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye /
T04sanssr_pu:5645: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre /
T04sanssr_pu:5646: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5648: yan nopalabhyate tan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5649: yan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5650: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nevāsti na nāstīty ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5652: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5659: tasyaivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5661: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5662: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5664: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5667: tad yathā na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum /
T04sanssr_pu:5668: na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tad evāṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5669: naiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5670: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutānavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5672: cittasyāvasthānām ekāgratāśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratāvikṣepa ity ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:5679: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatītīyam ucyate viṭhapanety ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5682: dharme dharmānudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5683: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5684: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5685: sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇam iti viditvānnāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5686: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:5693: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
T04sanssr_pu:5695: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:5697: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5700: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā /
T04sanssr_pu:5705: yādṛśāḥ samudānīyante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vākuśalā vā aniñjyā vā /
T04sanssr_pu:5707: na cāhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5709: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti //
T04sanssr_pu:5713: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5719: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5720: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5721: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
T04sanssr_pu:5722: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekaikaśu nāsti vartanā //
T04sanssr_pu:5725: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
T04sanssr_pu:5726: na ca anya tato na caiva tat /
T04sanssr_pu:5728: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5729: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5730: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5731: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskārannucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5732: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihopajāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5733: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
T04sanssr_pu:5734: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmeti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5737: akahiñci gatam annāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
T04sanssr_pu:5739: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5740: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04sanssr_pu:5741: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nāpy agatiś ca labhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5742: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5743: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5744: kaṇṭhauṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
T04sanssr_pu:5745: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5746: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
T04sanssr_pu:5749: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakopamāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5750: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
T04sanssr_pu:5752: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04sanssr_pu:5753: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam annāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5754: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5755: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
T04sanssr_pu:5759: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi /
T04sanssr_pu:5760: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5761: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5762: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
T04sanssr_pu:5763: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5764: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5765: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi //
T04sanssr_pu:5767: ratnacitro hy ayaṃ nāmnā ratnottamapara iti //
T04sanssr_pu:5772: evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duṣkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva tu punaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatām avataret /
T04sanssr_pu:5774: tataś ca chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti //
T04sanssr_pu:5776: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlachinnasya sarvaśākhā patrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:5777: evam eva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭyupaśamāt sarvakleśā upaśāmyantīti //
T04sanssr_pu:5780: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu traśatī sugatānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5781: so 'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśam etī /
T04sanssr_pu:5789: so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍa tāḍito na ca kupyī /
T04sanssr_pu:5790: so 'sau chidyati aṅgam aṅgaśo na ca kṣubhyo /
T04sanssr_pu:5794: pañcyo tasya abhijña bhāvitā ima nityaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5795: purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sa ca śūra / ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:5797: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny
T04sanssr_pu:5798: aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:5801: sarvāvaraṇī yāni śodhayitukāmena sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5802: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:5803: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaikacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5804: evaṃ sarvadikṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ity ādy iti [doubtful] vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:5806: karmaphalasaṃbandhāvirodhaś ca niḥsvabhāvatā ca yathādṛṣṭasarvadharmāvirodhaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:5812: kiṃ vaitad pratītyoktaṃ ṣaḍ ime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5814: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:5824: imāni ca mahārāja ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5830: tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedād aṣṭādaśa manopavicārā bhavanti / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5832: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5835: keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ity ādi /
T04sanssr_pu:5838: yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5839: tatra mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5840: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5841: sādhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
T04sanssr_pu:5842: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate /
T04sanssr_pu:5846: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā /
T04sanssr_pu:5850: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5852: yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5853: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5854: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5856: bhavati mahārāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5857: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5865: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5866: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5867: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5868: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharā īśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante /
T04sanssr_pu:5872: tad api mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5873: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5874: tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī agninā vā dahyate 'dbhir vā klidyate vāyunā vā vikīryate /
T04sanssr_pu:5875: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya
T04sanssr_pu:5876: vāgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā prajñāyate evam evāsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā
T04sanssr_pu:5877: lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣir na chāyikāvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5878: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:5879: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnya utpanno 'pi pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya /
T04sanssr_pu:5880: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
T04sanssr_pu:5881: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5882: evam evaitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5884: yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5890: aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāva ity ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5891: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvāśru pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5894: yāvat sa mahārājābdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5895: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:5896: sa pariśuṣyan nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5897: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5903: tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5904: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5905: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
T04sanssr_pu:5906: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5907: dvitīyasya sūryasa loke prādurbhāvād utsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaś ca śuṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:5910: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvān mahāsamudrasya yojanikam apy udakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5911: dviyojanikam api tricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanikam api yāvac catvāriṃśadyojanasahasram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5915: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitāny avaśiṣṭāni bhavanti / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5916: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre 'ṅgulisnehamātram apy udakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5917: sa mahārāja tāvān abdhātur nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5918: tasya khalu punar mahārājābdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5919: vyayo 'pi śūnyaḥ tiṣṭhann api so 'bdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya iti hi mahārājābdhātur abdhātutvenopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahāramātrāt /
T04sanssr_pu:5920: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ pūrvavat //
T04sanssr_pu:5922: yat kiñcid asmin kāye tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5926: yasya cotsadatvāj jvarito jvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:5928: yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5930: yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunāvāsam
T04sanssr_pu:5931: anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā
T04sanssr_pu:5932: kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitīty ādi /
T04sanssr_pu:5933: tatra mahārājādhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5934: iti hy abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchati svabhāvarahitatvāt //
T04sanssr_pu:5935: evaṃ yat kiñcid asmin kāye vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5937: tad yathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ity ādi /
T04sanssr_pu:5938: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyava iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5939: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5943: yaṃ satvāś cīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttena vā paryeṣyante /
T04sanssr_pu:5947: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam upagatam upāttam ākāśagatam ihābhyantarasaṃkhyābhūtaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5950: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena cābhyavaharati yatra cāvatiṣṭhate /
T04sanssr_pu:5953: evaṃ bāhye 'pi yad asphuṭam aspharaṇīyaṃ rūpagatenāpaliguddhaṃ suṣirabhāvaś chidraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:5955: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:5956: tatra saṃkhyā bhavaty ādhyātmika ākāśadhātur iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5958: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:5963: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet /
T04sanssr_pu:5964: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrākāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5968: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet /
T04sanssr_pu:5969: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:5973: na hy ākāśadhātur gamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5985: yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:5986: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5987: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nādhyātma bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇa
T04sanssr_pu:5988: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5989: sa utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:5990: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5993: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
T04sanssr_pu:5994: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:5998: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat /
T04sanssr_pu:5999: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nābdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6001: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6002: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6004: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā /
T04sanssr_pu:6005: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6009: ye ca dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā /
T04sanssr_pu:6010: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6012: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato nopalabhyate //
T04sanssr_pu:6014: annāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ copādāya sthānam apy asya nopalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6024: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā annabhilāpyā annabhilapanīyāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6025: yatra mahārāja indriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayā ity ucyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6026: cakṣur hi rūpe pratihanyate tasmād rūpāṇi cakṣurviṣayā ity ucyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6028: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6030: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti /
T04sanssr_pu:6035: tae ime viṣayā manogocarā ity ucyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6039: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati /
T04sanssr_pu:6041: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6044: evaṃ śabdādiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat //
T04sanssr_pu:6047: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
T04sanssr_pu:6049: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
T04sanssr_pu:6053: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:6059: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6061: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6064: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet /
T04sanssr_pu:6067: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā /
T04sanssr_pu:6068: tac ca karmābhisaṃskṛtam ādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
T04sanssr_pu:6069: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6073: jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6074: tad yathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6075: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇenaupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6076: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā āsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:6077: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
T04sanssr_pu:6079: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:6081: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:6083: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati //
T04sanssr_pu:6087: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:6096: karmaṇāṃ cābandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na cātra kaścit kartā na bhoktānyatra nāmasaṃketāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6097: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet /
T04sanssr_pu:6100: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6105: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:6111: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6112: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet /
T04sanssr_pu:6114: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6117: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣah suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6118: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret /
T04sanssr_pu:6119: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā /
T04sanssr_pu:6120: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat /
T04sanssr_pu:6121: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6123: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
T04sanssr_pu:6124: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
T04sanssr_pu:6129: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6131: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:6134: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
T04sanssr_pu:6136: evaṃ gandhādiṣu tridhā tridhā veditavyam // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6138: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6143: mukto mocayeyam āśvasta āśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
T04sanssr_pu:6144: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6145: iti hi mahārāja māyopamānīndriyāṇy atṛptāny atarṣaṇīyāni /
T04sanssr_pu:6147: atrānnantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6148: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
T04sanssr_pu:6150: evam eva mahārājānnantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate /
T04sanssr_pu:6151: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam annantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6159: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvopakaraṇavarṣaṃ cānubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā
T04sanssr_pu:6160: śakrasyārdhāsanam ākramyātīcchayā na mukto 'tṛpta eva kāmaiḥ kālagata iti /
T04sanssr_pu:6161: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryā ity evam uktvā ca rājānnantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6162: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6163: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyatae ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6167: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6171: annājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6173: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
T04sanssr_pu:6174: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhārthe //
T04sanssr_pu:6175: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6176: narakatiraś ca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca //
T04sanssr_pu:6177: nīcakulāṃs tatha uccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cety ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6179: katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T04sanssr_pu:6180: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanā āho śvit saṃjñā utāho saṃskārā atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
T04sanssr_pu:6182: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T04sanssr_pu:6187: tad evam annupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6191: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6194: nālam atra paṇḍitair abhiniveśa utpādayitavya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6198: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir annantakoṭir annāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6203: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcānantaryāṇi /
T04sanssr_pu:6205: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6210: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nopalabhāmahe /
T04sanssr_pu:6213: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:6214: koṭim api sa tasyopalabhate dvaye cāsau caratīti //
T04sanssr_pu:6216: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6217: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6218: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6219: na ca vacana cāsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
T04sanssr_pu:6220: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6221: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6222: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6223: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6224: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
T04sanssr_pu:6225: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6226: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
T04sanssr_pu:6227: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6228: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
T04sanssr_pu:6229: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6230: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
T04sanssr_pu:6231: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6232: ... ... hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6233: vimṛśatu bherīva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6234: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
T04sanssr_pu:6235: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6236: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6237: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6240: satvaś cāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
T04sanssr_pu:6242: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjāriham //
T04sanssr_pu:6243: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [doubtful] daśaddiśigataṃ naivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6244: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā /
T04sanssr_pu:6245: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6246: tena tvāṃ dvipadottamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjāriham //
T04sanssr_pu:6247: satvānaiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6248: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair noditāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6250: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:6252: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā naiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6253: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6254: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6255: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
T04sanssr_pu:6256: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
T04sanssr_pu:6257: śamathaś cātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
T04sanssr_pu:6258: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ / ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6261: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6262: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa notpadyate na nirudhyate / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6263: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nopalabhyate na tac cakṣur nendriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6265: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ no tu khalu paramārthato riktam upalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6266: evaṃ cakṣuś cendriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram //
T04sanssr_pu:6270: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6272: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
T04sanssr_pu:6275: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenāsya vyākaraṇam //
T04sanssr_pu:6282: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibimbam /
T04sanssr_pu:6284: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumāṅgaśo vicārayasi /
T04sanssr_pu:6287: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6288: śakaṭāṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya caiva kriyāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:6289: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:6290: vāteritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6291: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane /
T04sanssr_pu:6292: na nivartate vahnis tathaiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6293: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6296: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
T04sanssr_pu:6300: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānnutpannaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6302: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasyotpattim icchāmi na cānnutpannasyeti //
T04sanssr_pu:6304: tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6305: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6307: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā notpatsyante na nirotsyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6310: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathābhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6313: saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante cety asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6316: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ceti /
T04sanssr_pu:6317: na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6319: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6327: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
T04sanssr_pu:6329: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ paraḥparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6335: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti naite kasyacit /
T04sanssr_pu:6337: naite bhagavan dharmā udvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
T04sanssr_pu:6338: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
T04sanssr_pu:6341: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:6343: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6345: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
T04sanssr_pu:6346: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratīti /
T04sanssr_pu:6347: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasatvadarśanaṃ sarvasatvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanam adarśanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6348: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6352: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
T04sanssr_pu:6353: amūlā eva ca sarvadharmās tatvato mūlānupapatteḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6364: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6375: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6376: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6377: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6378: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
T04sanssr_pu:6380: nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nāsau śūnyatāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6381: jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam
T04sanssr_pu:6385: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6387: sā caitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
T04sanssr_pu:6388: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā /
T04sanssr_pu:6389: ekasya hi parātmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:6390: vinālambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6395: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihāpi janadurbhagāt //
T04sanssr_pu:6400: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautīti na saṃbhavaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6401: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ity ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6402: tattuṣṭyaiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadāstu sā /
T04sanssr_pu:6403: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama //
T04sanssr_pu:6404: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
T04sanssr_pu:6405: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihāṇv api //
T04sanssr_pu:6407: akīrtinindā satkārā evaṃ jñeyāś ca niṣphalāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6408: na dharmo nāyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanādibhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6412: saṃstavatyāgāc ca śīghraṃ cittaviśuddhir bhavati / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6418: lābhādikāmatā nāma ity ādy āvartate bahu /
T04sanssr_pu:6420: sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6421: tad evedam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt //
T04sanssr_pu:6422: avastu caitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:6423: ahaṃ caitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6431: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nādharmeṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:6435: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭveryāpatham āracayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6437: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā saviśvastaprekṣikayānnābhogaprekṣikayā /
T04sanssr_pu:6440: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6443: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā cālpecchatāṃ darśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6445: antardāha eṣa kulaputra yad vācālpecchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
T04sanssr_pu:6446: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhāpagato bhavati / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:6447: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:6451: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
T04sanssr_pu:6454: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6455: amukenāmukena vā me dānapatināmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayāmuka upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6456: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvā idaṃ cedaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśruta iti /
T04sanssr_pu:6458: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6459: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
T04sanssr_pu:6462: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo viṣamaparyeṣṭilābhāpagato bhavati / pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6463: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6465: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vādattā vānnanujñātā vā /
T04sanssr_pu:6472: mātāpitṛmitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālānukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś cāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /
T04sanssr_pu:6473: svanadhyavasito na cālabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6474: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatīty ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6475: tatraiṣāpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet //
T04sanssr_pu:6477: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantīdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante 'yaṃ dvitīya āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6479: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā /
T04sanssr_pu:6481: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad
T04sanssr_pu:6482: bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ kāye 'vakrāntaṃ yādṛśaṃ sarvasukhamaṇḍitāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6484: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6485: tad yathāpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6487: yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir annavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evāvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:6488: yair annutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
T04sanssr_pu:6489: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatīti vistaraḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6499: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti //
T04sanssr_pu:6500: pe / yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6501: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam annāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6502: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpāniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6505: evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6506: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:6507: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadati /
T04sanssr_pu:6508: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvāvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvopajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6509: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nnābhogaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6511: evaṃ dvayavigamatayā māyālakṣaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhaṃ bodhisatvas tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6514: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati //
T04sanssr_pu:6519: nāsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nāsti yācanakeṣūpataptadānaṃ nāsty uccagghana ullāpanadānaṃ nāsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nāsty apaviddhadānaṃ nāsty asvahastadānaṃ / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:6521: nāsty akāladānaṃ nāsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nāsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6527: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān /
T04sanssr_pu:6528: satvasaṃgrahahāniś cāto 'nyaprasādanopāyāsaṃbhave madyaṃ deyam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6529: śastrādiṣv api yady anubadhagurulādyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta /
T04sanssr_pu:6534: avirahitabodhicittatā cittaviśuddhyai apagataśrāvakapratyekabuddhacittatā prāmāṇikaviśuddhyai ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6541: yāvad achedyābhedyaṃ gaganam achedyābhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6543: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6549: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:6550: yaivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6579: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6583: saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryātyajanagocaraś cāyam api bodhisatvasya gocara / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6588: kim arthaṃ / grahītāraḥ subahavaḥ svalpaṃ cedam anena kiṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6591: tan na śrāvakasādhāraṇena śuddhimātreṇa satvānāṃ janyatae ity arthaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6594: na sa satvaḥ satvanikāye saṃvidyate yo bodhisatvasya balena balaṃ mardayed ity ādi //
