T04sanssr_pu:6596: yad uktam āryatathāgataguhyasūtre āryavajrapāṇer baladarśanavismitājātaśatrupṛṣṭena bhagavatā /
T04sanssr_pu:6597: daśabhir mahārāja dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ balavattāṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanssr_pu:6599: iha mahārāja bodhisatvaḥ kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ ca parityajati /
T04sanssr_pu:6601: sarvasatvānāṃ cāvanamati na ca punar mānaṃ bṛṃhayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6604: jighatsitānāṃ ca satvānām agraṃ varabhojanaṃ dadāti /
T04sanssr_pu:6606: glānānāṃ ca satvānāṃ bhūtacikitsāyai utsuko bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6616: ārabdhavīryeṇa sāgaramate bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ sadā dṛḍhaparākrameṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:6618: ārabdhavīryāṇāṃ hi sāgaramate bodhisatvānāṃ na durlabhā bhavaty annuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6622: nāsti kusīdasya dānaṃ yāvan nāsti prajñā nāsti kusīdasya parārtha iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6624: utpalaṃ vārimadhye vā so 'nupūrveṇa vardhatae /ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6629: tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6631: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenālpam api dānaṃ dadatā sarvasatveṣu
T04sanssr_pu:6635: yāvaj jātarūparajatodyānarājyādibhir upakaraṇaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6636: vinā ca karuṇayā na bodhisatvānāṃ kiṃcic ceṣṭitam iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6638: puṇyavṛddhiḥ sarvavṛddhīnāṃ mūlam iti tadarthaṃ parikarabandha ucyate //
T04sanssr_pu:6641: cittaśuddhikālabhāvitānāṃ vyavasāyādīnāṃ prayogārambhe punar āmukhīkaraṇena dṛḍhatāpādanārthaḥ ślokaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6643: āsannayuddhakālānāṃ astrakauśalyādaravat prayogasamakālaṃ dṛḍhīkariṣyāmīti śaithilyanivāraṇārtham ādigrahaṇam /
T04sanssr_pu:6670: yat kiñcit sarvasatvānāṃ pariprāpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:6671: yat sarvāryāḥ sarvanavayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisatvā na pariprāpayiṣyanti tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:6676: nāhaṃ pāramitābhir upasthātavyo mayā punaḥ pāramitā upasthātavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6678: yāvad ekākinā mayādvitīyenāsahāyena vajramaye mahīmaṇḍale sthitena sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6679: māraṃ dharṣayitvā ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānnuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyeti //
T04sanssr_pu:6681: tad yathāpi nāma sūryo devaputra udayamāno na tiṣṭhati /
T04sanssr_pu:6690: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyavipulagambhīracetā adīnasatvo guṇacaryājñānacaryāvasānaṃ yāvan na vivartate satvadrauhilyadoṣaiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6695: sarvajagatparitrāṇapraṇidhānasya satvakalikaluṣair na sraṃsanāṃ karoti yāvad bālajanasamavadhānena /
T04sanssr_pu:6700: yaś ca teṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ duṣkhaskandho vividhaṃ cāvaraṇīyaṃ karma samutthitaṃ yena te āvaraṇīyena karmaṇā buddhān na paśyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6703: tad ahaṃ teṣāṃ trividham āvaraṇīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ duṣkhaskandhena svakena śarīreṇopādadāmi tāsu tāsu narakopapattiṣv apāyabhūmiṣu saṃvāseṣu ca
T04sanssr_pu:6705: ahaṃ ca duṣkhopādānam upādadāmi vyavasyāmy utsahe /
T04sanssr_pu:6706: na nivarte na palāyāmi nottrasyāmi na saṃtrasyāmi na bibhemi na pratyudāvarte na viṣīdāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:6715: ajñānasamutthitakāntārāt tad ete mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvakāntārebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6716: tṛṣṇājālasaktā avidyānivaraṇāvṛtā bhavatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāḥ praṇāśaparyavasānā duṣkhapañjaraprakṣiptāś cārakasaṃniśritā /
T04sanssr_pu:6721: sarvasatvā hy ete mayā sarvajñatācittaplavena saṃsāradurgād dhartavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:6725: yāvad utsahe 'haṃ sarvāpāyeṣu sarvalokadhātuparyāpanneṣu sarvaduṣkhavāsam anubhavitum /
T04sanssr_pu:6726: na ca mayā sarvasatvāḥ kuśalamūlair vañcitavyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6727: vyavasyāmy aham ekaikasminn apāye 'parāntakoṭīgatān kalpān saṃvasayituṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6730: varaṃ khalu punar aham eko duṣkhitaḥ syāṃ na ceme sarvasatvāḥ apāyabhūmiprapatitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6732: sarvajagac ca niḥkretavyaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokakāntārād ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānām arthāya sarvaduṣkhavedanāskandham anena svakena śarīreṇānubhaveyam
T04sanssr_pu:6733: sarvasatvanidānam ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ prātibhāvyam utsahe satyavādī pratyayito 'visaṃvādakaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6736: sarvasatvārambaṇo mama sarvajñatācittotpāda utpanno yad uta sarvajagatparimocanāya /
T04sanssr_pu:6737: na cāhaṃ ratikāmatayānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito nāpi pañcakāmaguṇaratyanubhavanāya nāpi kāmaviṣayaniṣevaṇāya /
T04sanssr_pu:6743: sarvabuddhivivarṇito hy ayam upadeśaḥ yad uta kāmaniṣevaṇaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6744: ataś caiṣa sarvaduṣkhaskandhasyotpāda eva niṣevaṇaṃ ata eva ca narakatiryagyoniyamalokānām utpādaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6745: kalahabhaṇḍanavivādakṣobhāś ca satvānām ata eva prādurbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6746: ete ca satvāḥ kāmān niṣevamāṇāḥ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśād dūrībhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6747: svargopapatter apy ete kāmā antarāyāya saṃvartante /
T04sanssr_pu:6749: so 'ham evam apramāṇadoṣān kāmānāṃ paśyan parīttān ādīptāṃs tasmād aham etan nidānam acaraṇatāyāṃ pratipatsye // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6750: tathā tathaiva mayā kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā yathaiva sarvasatvā atyantasukham aveditasukhaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāsukhaṃ pratilabheran
T04sanssr_pu:6751: mayā sārathinā mayā pariṇāyakena mayolkādhāriṇā mayā kṣemagatidarśakena mayā kṣaṇagatipratilabdhena
T04sanssr_pu:6754: na khalu punar asmiṃś cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau yāvantaḥ satvās tāvanta eva sūryā udāgacchanti cāturdvīpakalokadhātvavabhāsanāya /
T04sanssr_pu:6755: atha ca punar eka evaiṣāṃ sūrya udāgacchati caturdvīpāvabhāsanāya /
T04sanssr_pu:6756: na ca teṣāṃ satvānāṃ caturdvīpopapannānāṃ svakasvakaiḥ śarīrair avabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6760: ahar ahar vā udyānanagareṣu ratikrīḍāparibhogam anubhaveyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6764: atha ca punaḥ sūryasya devaputrasyodayata ekasya sūryamaṇḍalasyādvitīyasya cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sarvasatvānām avabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6765: evam eva bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kuśalamūlāny upārpayamānasya kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayamānasyaivaṃ cittam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:6766: naiteṣāṃ satvānāṃ tat kuśalamūlaṃ vidyate yena te ātmānaṃ paritrāyeran /
T04sanssr_pu:6768: ahaṃ punaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlāni samudānayāmi kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:6770: sarvasatvānām avabhāsanāya sarvasatvānāṃ jñāpanāya saravsatvānām avatāraṇāya sarvasatvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6771: parigrahaṇāya sarvasatvānāṃ pariniṣpādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ prasādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6772: prahlādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ saṃśayacchedanāya ādityamaṇḍalakalpair asmābhir bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6774: na parasyāvakāśam utpādya satveṣu saṃnāha utsraṣṭavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6775: na ca sarvasatvānām antikāt sarvasatvatrāṇavyavaśāyo nivartayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6778: na parīttayā pariṇāmanayā tuṣṭir mantavyā ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6783: api tu khalv acintyam eva saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyati /
T04sanssr_pu:6784: yāvatī pūrvākoṭiḥ saṃsārasya yady etāvad ekaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:6785: evaṃrūpai rātriṃdivaiḥ pañcadaśadaivasikena pakṣeṇa triṃśaddaivasikena māsena dvādaśamāsikena
T04sanssr_pu:6786: saṃvatsareṇa anayā varṣagaṇanayā yāvad varṣaśatasahasreṇaikaṃ bodhicittam utpādayeyam
T04sanssr_pu:6787: ekaṃ ca tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6788: anena praveśenānayā gaṇanayā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamaiś cittotpādais tathāgatadarśanaiś ca ekaikasyāpi satvasya cittacaritaṃ jānīyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:6789: anenaiva praveśenānayā gaṇanayā sarvasatvānāṃ tāvadbhiś cittotpādais tathāgatadarśanaiḥ svacittacaritāni prajanīyām ity annavalīnaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6794: alam ebhiḥ satvair evaṃ khaṭuṅkair evaṃ durdāntair iti /
T04sanssr_pu:6798: na ca satvārthavaimukhyasya bodhisatvapariśuddhāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6799: tatra prājño bodhisatva evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:6800: tasmāt satvadhātor ye satvāḥ syuḥ pratyavarā dhajaḍaiḍamūkajātīyāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6801: aparinirvāṇadharmakāḥ kṛtsnā satvadhātau na cikitsitāḥ sarvabuddhaiḥ sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pratyākhyātāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6803: tān ahaṃ sarvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdyānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhayeyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:6804: evaṃ hi bodhisatvasya cintayataś cittotpāde cittotpāde sarvamārabhavanāni prakampante /
T04sanssr_pu:6811: yasya punar āśayo nāsti sarve buddhadharmās tasya dūre //
T04sanssr_pu:6812: āśayasaṃpannasya punar bhagavan yadi buddhā na bhavanti gaganatalād dharmaśabdo niścarati kuḍmavṛkṣebhyaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:6813: āśayaśuddhasya bodhisatvasya svamanojalpād eva sarvāvavādānuśāsanyo niścaranti /
T04sanssr_pu:6815: tad yathā bhagavan yasya pādau tasya gamanaṃ evaṃ bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhadharmāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6816: tad yathā bhagavan yasyottamāṅgaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhabodhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6817: tad yathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6818: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhatvalābhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6821: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati bodhisatvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6823: tad yathā bhagavan satsv abhramegheṣu varṣaṃ varṣaty asatsu na varṣati /
T04sanssr_pu:6824: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati buddhadharmāḥ pravartante /
T04sanssr_pu:6825: tad yathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6826: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayo vipannas tasya sarve kuśalā dharmā na bhūyaḥ saṃbhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6827: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisatvena buddhabodhyarthikena svāśayaḥ sūdgṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavya iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6873: tad evaṃ vyavasāyāśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraḥkṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye //
T04sanssr_pu:6875: atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:6877: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisatvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6881: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6882: tad yathā bhagavan yena rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:6884: evam eva bhagavan yena bodhisatvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati /
T04sanssr_pu:6886: tad yathā bhagavann āditye udite satvāḥ karmakriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6887: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatroditā bhavati tatrānyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6888: tad yathā bhagavan sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ manasādhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6889: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6890: tad yathā bhagavan jīvitendriye saty anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:6891: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:6893: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta sāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitendriyasyāśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvaṃgamāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6894: evam eva bhadanta sāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamāḥ // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6895: syād yathāpi nāma śreṣṭhino vā gṛhapater vā ekaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema /
T04sanssr_pu:6896: evam eva mahākaruṇāpratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya sarvasatveṣu majjāgataṃ premeti //
T04sanssr_pu:6898: svakam annekavidhaṃ pūrvānubhūtam anubhūyamānaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svātmany atyantam anniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā /
T04sanssr_pu:6899: priyādiṣu maitrī maitrīvatā bhāvayitavyā pratyutpannaduṣkhavyādhiṣu mahāduṣkhasāgarānavadhidīrghasaṃsāravyasanānunīteṣu vā //
T04sanssr_pu:6901: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty āścaryaṃ yāvad ajñānasaṃmūḍhā vateme bālapṛthagjanāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6902: yeṣām asaṃkhyeyā ātmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca /
T04sanssr_pu:6903: evaṃ ca kṣīyamāṇā kāye na nirvedam utpādayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:6917: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegam āpadyante bahūni duṣkhāni pratyanubhavantaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6919: hantāham eṣāṃ satvānāṃ duṣkhārtānām anāthānām atrāṇānām aśaraṇānām alayanānām āparāyaṇānām
T04sanssr_pu:6922: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayena saṃbhṛtena ime sarvasatvā abhyantaviśuddhim anuprāpnuyur iti //
T04sanssr_pu:6924: saṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā vateme satvā nirayatiryagyoniyamalokaprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuprāptāḥ mohagahanasaṃchannā mithyāmārgavitathaprayātā
T04sanssr_pu:6935: te 'smābhir mahākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave arajasi śivasarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:6938: te asmābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke abhayapure sarvaduṣkhopaśame [doubtful] annāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:6939: evam ebhiḥ paraḥparadṛḍhīkṛtyair vyavasāyāśayakāruṇyaiḥ puṇyavṛddhim ārabhet /
T04sanssr_pu:6940: tatra tāvad bhadrācāryāvidhiḥ kāryā vandanādiḥ sadādarāt //
T04sanssr_pu:6941: āryogradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ hi trirātre trir divasasya ca śuceḥ śucivastraprāvṛtasya ca triskandhakapravartanam uktaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:6955: iha bodhisatvo yānīmāni bhavanti puṣpajātāni vā phalajātāni vā amamāny aparigrahāṇi /
T04sanssr_pu:6956: tāni triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayati // pe //
T04sanssr_pu:6957: sayathīme [doubtful] dhūpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā amamā aparigrahās tān api triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayatīti //
T04sanssr_pu:6961: anayā ca diśā sarvabhaiṣajyāni sarvarasāyanāni sarvasalilāni annavadyāni ammaṇḍalāni /
T04sanssr_pu:6963: vivṛtteṣu vā lokadhātuṣu ye paramarasasparśasaṃpannā bhūparpaṭakāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:6967: pariśuddheṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye ramaṇīyatarāḥ paribhogāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7063: etac ca bhāvayan sarvatra pariṇāmayāmīti yojyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7064: āryāvalokiteśvaravimokṣe ca yad uktaṃ tad apy evaṃ yojyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7084: saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyam annuttarā pariṇāmanā yeyam āryabhadracaryāgāthāyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7085: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantata bhadra tathaiva /
T04sanssr_pu:7086: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7087: sarvatriyadhva gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā /
T04sanssr_pu:7088: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7089: iti śikṣāsamuccaye bhadracaryāvidhiḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7096: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā /
T04sanssr_pu:7098: varṇavān rūpasaṃpanno lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ sthāmnā balena copeto nāsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [doubtful] //
T04sanssr_pu:7099: āḍhyo mahādhanaś cāsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api /
T04sanssr_pu:7102: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī //
T04sanssr_pu:7106: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7107: ścyuta/ cāsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane /
T04sanssr_pu:7109: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7110: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam //
T04sanssr_pu:7111: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7112: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate //
T04sanssr_pu:7115: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
T04sanssr_pu:7116: yaś ceha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam //
T04sanssr_pu:7117: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7118: tasyeha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7120: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
T04sanssr_pu:7125: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7126: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān //
T04sanssr_pu:7128: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7129: cakravartī ca rājāsau śakraś ca bhavatīśvaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7130: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7132: sarve 'syārthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7133: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatropapadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:7136: priyaḥ sadayitaś cāsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7137: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7139: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7140: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7141: tasyānuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7142: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7143: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya //
T04sanssr_pu:7144: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahānubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
T04sanssr_pu:7145: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke //
T04sanssr_pu:7148: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7149: tasyeha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7150: pāṇītaleṣu suruciru muktahārāḥ prādurbhavantī vividha annantakalpāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7151: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7152: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
T04sanssr_pu:7153: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye //
T04sanssr_pu:7154: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7155: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7156: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:7157: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati annantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7158: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sada apramattaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7159: na tasya agniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya //
T04sanssr_pu:7160: adho upādāya ca vibhavāgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7161: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriya evarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayata eka dīpam //
T04sanssr_pu:7162: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitāṅgo dṛḍhāsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
T04sanssr_pu:7163: ālokaprāpto [doubtful] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7164: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7165: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam //
T04sanssr_pu:7166: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7167: tasyeha bhoty asadṛśa ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7168: yebhir jinasya pratapata ātmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [doubtful] kāñcanasya /
T04sanssr_pu:7169: jāmbūnado vā suruciradarśanīyā abhikīrṇa ... kusumita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7171: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7172: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7174: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
T04sanssr_pu:7175: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datveha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7176: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
T04sanssr_pu:7177: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarāṅgu tasyāvikala viśuddha bhoti //
T04sanssr_pu:7178: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7179: ghraṇendriyaṃ parama uttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7180: jihvāsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
T04sanssr_pu:7181: raktā pravālā yathariva [doubtful] devatānāṃ svarāṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7182: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nāpi ca nāmitāṅgaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7183: viśiṣṭa bhotī surucira ātmabhāvo vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7184: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahorago vā /
T04sanssr_pu:7185: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7186: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditāṅgaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7187: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
T04sanssr_pu:7188: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
T04sanssr_pu:7189: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
T04sanssr_pu:7190: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
T04sanssr_pu:7191: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhānulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanssr_pu:7192: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe /
T04sanssr_pu:7193: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanssr_pu:7194: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke arthaṃ sahasrā tulayati no cireṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:7195: karoti cārthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanssr_pu:7196: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7197: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanssr_pu:7198: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7199: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanssr_pu:7200: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś cāsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
T04sanssr_pu:7201: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7202: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
T04sanssr_pu:7203: naiṣkramyaprāptau ca adīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7204: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7205: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7206: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñābhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
T04sanssr_pu:7207: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanssr_pu:7208: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
T04sanssr_pu:7213: na tasya rājāpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye //
T04sanssr_pu:7214: kumārga sarvaṃ pithita apāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7215: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7216: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty annekān /
T04sanssr_pu:7217: āśvāsaprāptaś ca annantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
T04sanssr_pu:7219: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
T04sanssr_pu:7220: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
T04sanssr_pu:7221: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7222: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
T04sanssr_pu:7223: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7224: tasyeha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devāsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7225: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśa īśvarāṃś ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7226: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
T04sanssr_pu:7227: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti caiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham //
T04sanssr_pu:7228: paricāro 'sya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7229: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadābhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7230: paricāra bhoty asya svarāṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
T04sanssr_pu:7231: na tasya kaścij janayati ceśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
T04sanssr_pu:7233: ākruṣṭaḥ san nājanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7234: devendra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
T04sanssr_pu:7235: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatīha stūpaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7236: nāsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
T04sanssr_pu:7237: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam //
T04sanssr_pu:7238: sūtrāntacaryā na kadācid asya nāsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
T04sanssr_pu:7239: satvāś ca tṛptā muditāsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7241: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti //
T04sanssr_pu:7242: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nāsya bhonti atulyatāptaś ca susaṃsthitāṅgaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7243: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7245: tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
T04sanssr_pu:7246: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalamatreṣu dhātuṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7247: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7248: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyāntaśa ekapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7249: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān annādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:7250: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7253: saced antaśaḥ svapnāntaragatā api satvā buddham ālambyākāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmīti //
T04sanssr_pu:7255: aṣṭābhir bhujagādhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
T04sanssr_pu:7262: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7272: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7275: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihārāgito jinaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7286: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7287: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate /
T04sanssr_pu:7291: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam /
T04sanssr_pu:7292: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7293: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7294: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7297: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi
T04sanssr_pu:7299: yaś cānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
T04sanssr_pu:7301: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
T04sanssr_pu:7304: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
T04sanssr_pu:7311: tathāgatacaityeṣu puṣpāvaropaṇaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāv avikalatā anuprāpnoti /
T04sanssr_pu:7318: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikala iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7320: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
T04sanssr_pu:7322: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7324: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
T04sanssr_pu:7326: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7327: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekaikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7328: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
T04sanssr_pu:7329: yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvādīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
T04sanssr_pu:7330: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
T04sanssr_pu:7331: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti / peyālaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7332: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7333: satkuryuḥ yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7335: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahārghataraṃ ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7336: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7337: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād
T04sanssr_pu:7338: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:7339: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
T04sanssr_pu:7340: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśa ekapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
T04sanssr_pu:7341: asya dānasyaitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
T04sanssr_pu:7344: catura imān bhadrānuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:7346: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati māṃ ca dṛṣṭvānye 'pi tathā śikṣiṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7347: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:7348: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:7358: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvā annanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
T04sanssr_pu:7368: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sāmiṣeṇa /
T04sanssr_pu:7370: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
T04sanssr_pu:7374: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
T04sanssr_pu:7375: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
T04sanssr_pu:7376: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7377: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati //
T04sanssr_pu:7378: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat / pe /
T04sanssr_pu:7379: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palāgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7380: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7381: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanssr_pu:7383: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7387: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
T04sanssr_pu:7388: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
T04sanssr_pu:7390: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra
T04sanssr_pu:7391: tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7394: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
T04sanssr_pu:7396: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny
T04sanssr_pu:7397: anumoditāni yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān satvān
T04sanssr_pu:7400: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās
T04sanssr_pu:7401: te sarve 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya
T04sanssr_pu:7402: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
T04sanssr_pu:7403: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7405: sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetāgrayānumodanayā
T04sanssr_pu:7406: jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttarayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā
T04sanssr_pu:7410: bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad
T04sanssr_pu:7413: athavāgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:7416: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsā āryograparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyeti //
T04sanssr_pu:7424: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7431: yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti //
T04sanssr_pu:7433: yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati //
T04sanssr_pu:7435: yena vīryeṇa kāyalaghutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate sarvakāryāṇi cottārayati //
T04sanssr_pu:7441: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7447: yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /
T04sanssr_pu:7448: sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
T04sanssr_pu:7452: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
T04sanssr_pu:7453: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
T04sanssr_pu:7456: yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7458: yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:7461: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7463: yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkaroti tān prajñendriyeṇa pratyavekṣate pratividhyati /
T04sanssr_pu:7464: yad eteṣu dharmeṣu pratyātmajñānam aparapratyayajñānam idam ucyate prajñendriyaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7465: evam imāni pañcendriyāṇi sahitāny anuprabaddhāni sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrayanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7470: yad ebhir evendriyair upastabdho 'nnavamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7482: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīn ayutabimbareṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7483: tāṃ pūjakṛtvā puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpo na bhavati maitracitta / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7487: vandāmi te asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā //
T04sanssr_pu:7488: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava coṣṇir iha /
T04sanssr_pu:7489: noṣnīṣam īkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune //
T04sanssr_pu:7491: kṛpayekṣase jagad idaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina //
T04sanssr_pu:7492: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7493: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā //
T04sanssr_pu:7494: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpy aviralāḥ sahitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7495: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā //
T04sanssr_pu:7496: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān /
T04sanssr_pu:7497: brahmendrapālajagato bhagavan jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā //
T04sanssr_pu:7499: īkṣan vrajasy api yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān //
T04sanssr_pu:7500: kāyaś ca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan sūkṣma chavī kanakavarṇanibhā /
T04sanssr_pu:7501: nekṣañ jagad vrajati tṛptim idaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara //
T04sanssr_pu:7504: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7506: tvaṃ vādisūra kugaṇapramathī tvaṃ siṃhavan nadasi parṣadi ca /
T04sanssr_pu:7507: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara //
T04sanssr_pu:7510: māyopamaṃ jagad imaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ viditaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7511: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7512: śūnyāś ca śānta annutpādanayaṃ avijānad eva jagad udbhramati /
T04sanssr_pu:7514: rāgādibhiś ca bahurāgaśataiḥ saṃbhrāmitaṃ satata vīkṣya jagat /
T04sanssr_pu:7517: satatāturaṃ jagad avekṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā //
T04sanssr_pu:7518: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretaniraye sugatau /
T04sanssr_pu:7519: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ tasya pradarśayasi mārgavaraṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7520: ye te babhūvu purimāś ca jināḥ dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7521: ayam eva taiḥ prakathitāryapatho yad deśayasy api vibho 'pratimaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7522: snigdhaṃ hy akarkaśa manojña varaṃ brahmādhikaṃ paramaprītikaraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7525: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyutasatvaśatāḥ yānatrayeṇa janayanti śamam //
T04sanssr_pu:7526: tava pūjayā sukham annekavidham divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā /
T04sanssr_pu:7527: āḍhyo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7528: balacakravarty api ca dvīpapatiḥ jagad āvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7529: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhā tvayi saṃprasādajanako 'pratimaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7530: brahmāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣiṭa devapatiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7531: paranirmito 'pi ca sa yāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ //

T04sanssr_pu:7534: mārgajña mārgakuśalā bhagavan kupathān nivārayasi lokam imaṃ /

T04sanssr_pu:7536: puṇyārthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā /

T04sanssr_pu:7632: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te /

T04sanssr_pu:7647: sarvatra dharmaṃ deśenti tena ucyanti nāyakāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7648: kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā /
T04sanssr_pu:7649: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te //

T04sanssr_pu:7652: saṃcintya gaṇikāṃ bhonti puṃsām ākarṣaṇāya te /

T04sanssr_pu:7661: abhayaṃ teṣu datvā ca paripācenti bodhaye //
T04sanssr_pu:7662: pañcābhijñāś ca te bhūtvā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7665: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca //
T04sanssr_pu:7666: yena yenaiva cāṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:7668: yeṣām annantā śikṣā hi annantaś cāpi gocaraḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7671: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇāntaḥ suvaco bhaved / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:7673: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ /

T04sanssr_pu:7681: raśmi pramuñciya dhvajāgraviyūhā te dhvaja pāṇḍuralohitapītāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7684: paṭṭa patāka pralambita dāmā kiṅkiṇijāla jinasvaraghoṣān //
T04sanssr_pu:7685: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yatha ekajinasya karonti /
T04sanssr_pu:7687: eṣa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ te jagasaṃgrahajñānavikurvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7700: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena //
T04sanssr_pu:7701: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena /
T04sanssr_pu:7702: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7703: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [doubtful] agrasamādhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7705: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7706: ye pariṣkāra sukhāvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7707: dātu dadanti karonti jagārthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasāgraiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7711: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7713: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī /
T04sanssr_pu:7715: ye catur eva aśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti /
T04sanssr_pu:7716: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathāśaya loke //
T04sanssr_pu:7718: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena //
T04sanssr_pu:7720: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya //
T04sanssr_pu:7721: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7725: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānā ācari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7726: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagārthaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7728: tatra jarārdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśātmā //
T04sanssr_pu:7730: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti //
T04sanssr_pu:7732: buddhamahātma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagārtham //
T04sanssr_pu:7733: te ca adeśa ṛddhyanuśāstī rūpadhiṣṭhānabalena samantāt /
T04sanssr_pu:7734: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti //
T04sanssr_pu:7735: te vividhehi upāyanayehi lokavicāri karonti jagārthaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7736: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti //
T04sanssr_pu:7737: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ /

T04sanssr_pu:7742: cintamaṇi druma kāmadadāś ca deśika utpathamārgagatānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7743: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7746: vidyabalauṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7747: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramāgrā yatrādhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7748: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7750: nagna acelaguruśramaṇānāṃ tīrthika ācaryā hi bhavanti //

T04sanssr_pu:7752: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //

T04sanssr_pu:7756: mūlaphalāmbucarā api bhūtvā dharma acintiya te paramāgrāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7758: ye muṣaleśaya [doubtful] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
T04sanssr_pu:7759: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyā āśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya /

T04sanssr_pu:7771: te yathasatya niruktividhijñā evam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā /
T04sanssr_pu:7772: dharmam acintiya vākyapathajñā deśayi eṣa samādhivikurvā //
T04sanssr_pu:7774: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti //

T04sanssr_pu:7776: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu annuttari jñānavarasya //

T04sanssr_pu:7778: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7779: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7780: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7781: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī /
T04sanssr_pu:7782: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7783: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān /
T04sanssr_pu:7785: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7787: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7788: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7793: kāma vivarṇita varṇitadhyānā tṛṣṇavinodani tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7794: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7795: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū //
T04sanssr_pu:7797: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7798: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7799: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7801: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā //
T04sanssr_pu:7804: puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /

T04sanssr_pu:7807: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7808: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7809: eka tu dharma mukhātu annekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
T04sanssr_pu:7810: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
T04sanssr_pu:7811: dharmapadārthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7812: prajñapradīpaya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7813: śūnya nisatva ajātavipannān otari dharma abhāvasvabhāvān /
T04sanssr_pu:7815: dharma asvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7816: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7818: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7819: dharma anugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7820: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7821: jñātvā anitya aśāśvatabhogān tyāgaratīrata te sada bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7822: matsaradurdama satva adāntā jñātva dhanaṃ supinābhrasvabhāvaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7823: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7824: niṣparidāha ya osari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7825: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7826: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
T04sanssr_pu:7827: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7828: kṣāntiviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya ya akṣama codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7829: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7830: duḥkṛta kṣānti apāyamatīnāṃ citta akṣobhita bodhinidānaṃ /

T04sanssr_pu:7832: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7833: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //

T04sanssr_pu:7836: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7837: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tena utaptavatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7838: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7839: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7840: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7841: varṇita dhyāna praśānta araṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7842: prajñaviyūha ya osari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7843: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye asmin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7846: rājyadhanātmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7847: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7848: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7849: buddha sahasra anneka acintyān paśyiṣu padmavaneṣu niṣaṇṇān //
T04sanssr_pu:7851: buddhabalāviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7852: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyābhayārdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7854: ye abhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
T04sanssr_pu:7855: trāyita yaccharaṇāgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7856: sarvasukhāvaha osari raśmī tāya gilānaya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7858: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
T04sanssr_pu:7859: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7860: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacodita āyu kṣayānte /
T04sanssr_pu:7861: buddha anusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7862: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā jinabimbān /
T04sanssr_pu:7863: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇānte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7864: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:7865: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti //
T04sanssr_pu:7867: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7868: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7869: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
T04sanssr_pu:7872: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7873: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7874: duṣkha anneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityam akṣemaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7875: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7876: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7878: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā /
T04sanssr_pu:7879: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7880: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7881: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
T04sanssr_pu:7882: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7883: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7884: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7885: ghrātvā amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
T04sanssr_pu:7892: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7893: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7894: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7896: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
T04sanssr_pu:7898: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī /
T04sanssr_pu:7899: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7900: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7901: akṣayaratnanidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānata arthanidarśani labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7902: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
T04sanssr_pu:7903: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7904: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
T04sanssr_pu:7906: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
T04sanssr_pu:7907: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7908: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
T04sanssr_pu:7909: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7910: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna svindriya bhonti /
T04sanssr_pu:7911: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //
T04sanssr_pu:7912: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
T04sanssr_pu:7913: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7914: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarendrān /
T04sanssr_pu:7916: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī /
T04sanssr_pu:7917: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
T04sanssr_pu:7918: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
T04sanssr_pu:7919: gandhavarāgra janair jinastūpān snāpanabodhidruma prabha eṣā //
T04sanssr_pu:7920: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7922: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
T04sanssr_pu:7923: śaktitriśūlāsi [doubtful] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumotpala bhontī //
T04sanssr_pu:7924: duṣya anneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7926: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
T04sanssr_pu:7928: pratyaya jāta ajāta svabhāvā dharmaśarīra ajātaśarīrāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7929: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:7930: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7932: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī /
T04sanssr_pu:7933: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7934: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
T04sanssr_pu:7935: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7936: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7937: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7938: ye ca śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7939: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7940: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke /
T04sanssr_pu:7941: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svaka svaka dharme //
T04sanssr_pu:7942: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
T04sanssr_pu:7943: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7944: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7945: te pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7946: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
T04sanssr_pu:7947: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7948: yasy imu [doubtful] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [doubtful] prasādaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7949: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7954: te daśakṣetrarajopama anye padmam adhiṣṭhihi saṃparivāraṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7955: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
T04sanssr_pu:7956: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpadita buddhaguṇeṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7957: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7958: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7959: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7965: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarāgraśarīrā /
T04sanssr_pu:7971: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
T04sanssr_pu:7972: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7973: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7974: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:7975: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam /
T04sanssr_pu:7978: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:7982: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahātmā //
T04sanssr_pu:7983: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
T04sanssr_pu:7984: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān //
T04sanssr_pu:7985: eti samādhi vimokṣa acintyās teṣa acintyaguṇopacitānāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7986: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
T04sanssr_pu:7987: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo /
T04sanssr_pu:7988: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā //
T04sanssr_pu:7989: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka eka bhavībahu bhontī /
T04sanssr_pu:7990: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
T04sanssr_pu:7991: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi annarthiku loka upekṣī /
T04sanssr_pu:7992: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitaiṣī //
T04sanssr_pu:7993: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:7995: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:7997: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
T04sanssr_pu:7998: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
T04sanssr_pu:7999: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
T04sanssr_pu:8000: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
T04sanssr_pu:8001: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra annantān /
T04sanssr_pu:8003: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8004: dhyāna abhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8005: rāhu yatheṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8006: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8007: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī /
T04sanssr_pu:8008: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi annantā //
T04sanssr_pu:8010: yātuka bimbarannekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
T04sanssr_pu:8011: sarvasurendrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svāyum /
T04sanssr_pu:8012: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8013: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8014: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurendrāḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8015: so hita itvarapuṇyabalenā śakra vikurvati devajayārthī /
T04sanssr_pu:8016: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī //
T04sanssr_pu:8017: ... vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
T04sanssr_pu:8018: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya //
T04sanssr_pu:8019: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8020: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
T04sanssr_pu:8027: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8030: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8031: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8035: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8041: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8043: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8045: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8049: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8051: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8053: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām annekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8056: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8062: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
T04sanssr_pu:8064: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
T04sanssr_pu:8066: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhya eva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
T04sanssr_pu:8069: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
T04sanssr_pu:8070: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8072: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropakaraṇena ca /
T04sanssr_pu:8074: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti tebhya evaitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
T04sanssr_pu:8075: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8076: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasāparāddhavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8077: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:8078: annuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:8079: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
T04sanssr_pu:8080: ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
T04sanssr_pu:8081: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8088: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
T04sanssr_pu:8089: aho vatālpapuṇyā amī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
T04sanssr_pu:8090: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
T04sanssr_pu:8091: abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
T04sanssr_pu:8092: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathāṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:8093: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
T04sanssr_pu:8094: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8096: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me
T04sanssr_pu:8097: 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:8098: sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
T04sanssr_pu:8099: sukhitā eva te satvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8100: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evākāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:8101: tad yathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
T04sanssr_pu:8102: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
T04sanssr_pu:8103: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadeti //
T04sanssr_pu:8113: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:8129: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8130: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04sanssr_pu:8131: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇārādhitaḥ syāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8132: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve
T04sanssr_pu:8133: 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
T04sanssr_pu:8135: tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8139: ataḥ sa ānanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T04sanssr_pu:8140: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T04sanssr_pu:8147: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati
T04sanssr_pu:8149: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānnuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8153: kālena co cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
T04sanssr_pu:8154: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8155: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
T04sanssr_pu:8156: udāraprajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe //
T04sanssr_pu:8157: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8158: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
T04sanssr_pu:8160: sudhautapādaś ca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi //
T04sanssr_pu:8161: dharmāsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekāgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
T04sanssr_pu:8162: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś co bhikṣunikās tathaiva //
T04sanssr_pu:8163: kilāsitāś cāpi vivarjayīta na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8164: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
T04sanssr_pu:8165: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭāntakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8166: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathaiva toṣayet na cāpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
T04sanssr_pu:8167: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsanacīvarāṇi /
T04sanssr_pu:8168: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñapet parṣadi kiñcid anyat //
T04sanssr_pu:8169: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
T04sanssr_pu:8170: etac ca me sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //
T04sanssr_pu:8172: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇāpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
T04sanssr_pu:8174: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
T04sanssr_pu:8176: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8177: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
T04sanssr_pu:8178: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8180: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
T04sanssr_pu:8181: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8182: bhaveyur yadi cālpecchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8183: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
T04sanssr_pu:8185: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:8211: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
T04sanssr_pu:8212: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:8213: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyemāni mantrapadāny
T04sanssr_pu:8215: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatā upasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
T04sanssr_pu:8216: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //
T04sanssr_pu:8217: atraivāha / dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:8221: tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
T04sanssr_pu:8222: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhāropacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8224: eṣādikā ādikarmikāṇāṃ sahasā bodhisatvaśikṣā smaraṇārtham upadarśitā /
T04sanssr_pu:8229: tatrānnutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām annutpādāyaiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātīty anena rakṣā //
T04sanssr_pu:8230: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty anena śuddhiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8231: annutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8232: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatīty ādi /
T04sanssr_pu:8234: etāni ca nityam apramādādhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
T04sanssr_pu:8236: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8237: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita / iti //
T04sanssr_pu:8240: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchilasaṃkrameṇa bhṛtyasya gacchataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8244: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:8246: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
T04sanssr_pu:8248: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T04sanssr_pu:8250: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyārakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:8251: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca tasyānulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8252: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8253: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8254: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
T04sanssr_pu:8255: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8256: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakādhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astīti prajānāti /
T04sanssr_pu:8258: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //
T04sanssr_pu:8260: sadāpramādo hy amṛtasya mūlaṃ satvārthayuktasya ca bodhicittaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8261: yad yoniśaś caiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //
T04sanssr_pu:8264: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyāstv apāratā /
T04sanssr_pu:8265: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
T04sanssr_pu:8266: tadduṣkhena na me bādhety ato yadi na rakṣasi /
T04sanssr_pu:8267: nāgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //
T04sanssr_pu:8269: anya eva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //
T04sanssr_pu:8270: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8272: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
T04sanssr_pu:8279: kāyaś cet pratimākāraḥ pesībhasmasu nāsti saḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8280: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8283: tatra cintaiva me nāsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
T04sanssr_pu:8284: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā caiva dṛśyate //
T04sanssr_pu:8287: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇā api /
T04sanssr_pu:8288: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ naikavidhaṃ jagat //
T04sanssr_pu:8290: sukhāder na paṭṭotpattiḥ paṭṭādes tu sukhādayaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8294: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
T04sanssr_pu:8296: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate /
T04sanssr_pu:8297: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:8299: tatrābhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
T04sanssr_pu:8301: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parātmanoḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8302: ayuktam api ced etat svātmany astītaratra na /
T04sanssr_pu:8303: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:8304: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
T04sanssr_pu:8309: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇāpy arasena kim //
T04sanssr_pu:8310: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
T04sanssr_pu:8326: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
T04sanssr_pu:8328: loke duṣkhāgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
T04sanssr_pu:8330: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8331: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svārtham utsṛjan //
T04sanssr_pu:8334: yad bhayān notsṛjāmy etat tad evādadato bhayaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8335: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8337: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā //
T04sanssr_pu:8341: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vopayojayet //
T04sanssr_pu:8342: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ neha duṣkhakṛt /
T04sanssr_pu:8348: kopaḥ kasyārtham adyāpi mṛṣā vā tan mayoditam //
T04sanssr_pu:8349: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
T04sanssr_pu:8350: nirdayasyāpi kaḥ kopaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati //
T04sanssr_pu:8354: nāpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogārthaṃ nopayāti ca //
T04sanssr_pu:8360: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
T04sanssr_pu:8362: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
T04sanssr_pu:8367: ka eva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
T04sanssr_pu:8372: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā //
T04sanssr_pu:8374: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat //
T04sanssr_pu:8378: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
T04sanssr_pu:8380: tatraikena raṇāsaktam anye nighnanti māṃ sukham //
T04sanssr_pu:8381: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
T04sanssr_pu:8382: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
T04sanssr_pu:8391: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
T04sanssr_pu:8401: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathātyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyopārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
T04sanssr_pu:8402: bhavatu sukham annantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam annantavyomasīmādhipatyaṃ //
